summary.span: 模块包含用于执行文件、目录或文件夹以及系统操作的过程。

span.span: The module contains the procedures that are used to perform file, directory or folder, and system operations.

summary.span: 与使用 模块相比， 功能在文件 I/O 操作方面可为您提供更高的效率和更好的性能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than using the module.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模块支持访问文件和文件夹的 Visual Basic 语言关键字和运行库成员。This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and run-time library members that access files and folders. ## Examples 此示例使用 `GetAttr` 函数来确定文件和目录或文件夹的属性。This example uses the `GetAttr` function to determine the attributes of a file and directory or folder. remarks.format: ## Remarks `ChDir`函数会更改默认目录，但不会更改默认的驱动器。The `ChDir` function changes the default directory, but not the default drive. 例如，如果默认驱动器是 C，则以下语句将更改驱动器 D 上的默认目录，但 C 仍是默认驱动器：For example, if the default drive is C, the following statement changes the default directory on drive D, but C remains the default drive: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#39)] 可以通过键入两个句点来进行相对目录更改，如下所示：You can make relative directory changes is by typing two periods, as follows: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#40)] > [!IMPORTANT] > `ChDir`函数需要非托管代码权限，这可能会影响在部分信任情况下的执行。The `ChDir` function requires unmanaged code permission, which may affect its execution in partial-trust situations. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 。For more information, see and . ## Examples 此示例使用 `ChDir` 函数更改当前目录或文件夹。This example uses the `ChDir` function to change the current directory or folder. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#41](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#41)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dir`函数支持使用多字符 (`*`) 和单字符 (`?`) 通配符来指定多个文件。The `Dir` function supports the use of multiple-character (`*`) and single-character (`?`) wildcards to specify multiple files. `VbVolume` 返回驱动器的卷标，而不是特定的文件名。`VbVolume` returns the volume label for the drive instead of a specific file name. `PathName`第一次调用函数时，必须提供 `Dir` 。You must supply a `PathName` the first time that you call the `Dir` function. 若要检索下一项，可以对 `Dir` 不带参数的函数进行后续调用。To retrieve the next item, you can make subsequent calls to the `Dir` function without parameters. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要正确运行，该 `Dir` 函数要求将 和 标志 授予执行代码。To run correctly, the `Dir` function requires the and flags of to be granted to the executing code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 、 和 [代码访问权限](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)。For more information, see , , and [Code Access Permissions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675). `Attributes`参数枚举值如下所示：The `Attributes` argument enumeration values are as follows: |“值”Value|返回的常量Constant|描述Description| |-|-|-| |`Normal`|`vbnormal`|默认。Default. 指定没有属性的文件。Specifies files without attributes.| |`ReadOnly`|`vbReadOnly`|指定只读文件以及没有属性的文件。Specifies read-only files, and also files without attributes.| |`Hidden`|`vbHidden`|指定隐藏的文件，还指定没有属性的文件。Specifies hidden files, and also files without attributes.| |`System`|`vbSystem`|指定系统文件以及没有属性的文件。Specifies system files, and also files without attributes.| |`Volume`|`vbVolume`|指定卷标;如果指定任何其他属性， `vbVolume` 则将忽略。Specifies volume label; if any other attribute is specified, `vbVolume` is ignored.| |`Directory`|`vbDirectory`|指定目录或文件夹以及没有属性的文件。Specifies directories or folders, and also files without attributes.| |`Archive`|`vbArchive`|文件自上次备份后已更改。File has changed since last backup.| |`Alias`|`vbAlias`|文件具有不同的名称。File has a different name.| > [!NOTE] > 这些枚举由 Visual Basic 语言指定，可用于代码中的任何位置，而不是实际值。These enumerations are specified by the Visual Basic language and can be used anywhere in your code instead of the actual values. ## Examples 此示例使用 `Dir` 函数检查是否存在特定的文件和目录。This example uses the `Dir` function to check if certain files and directories exist. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dir`函数支持使用多字符 (`*`) 和单字符 (`?`) 通配符来指定多个文件。The `Dir` function supports the use of multiple-character (`*`) and single-character (`?`) wildcards to specify multiple files. `VbVolume` 返回驱动器的卷标，而不是特定的文件名。`VbVolume` returns the volume label for the drive instead of a specific file name. `PathName`第一次调用函数时，必须提供 `Dir` 。You must supply a `PathName` the first time that you call the `Dir` function. 若要检索下一项，可以对 `Dir` 不带参数的函数进行后续调用。To retrieve the next item, you can make subsequent calls to the `Dir` function with no parameters. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要正确运行，该 `Dir` 函数要求将 和 标志 授予执行代码。To run correctly, the `Dir` function requires the and flags of to be granted to the executing code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 、 和 [代码访问权限](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)。For more information, see , , and [Code Access Permissions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675). `Attributes`参数枚举值如下所示：The `Attributes` argument enumeration values are as follows: |“值”Value|返回的常量Constant|描述Description| |-|-|-| |`Normal`|`vbnormal`|默认。Default. 指定没有属性的文件。Specifies files that have no attributes.| |`ReadOnly`|`vbReadOnly`|指定只读文件以及没有属性的文件。Specifies read-only files, in addition to files that have no attributes.| |`Hidden`|`vbHidden`|除了指定没有属性的文件，还指定隐藏文件。Specifies hidden files, in addition to files that have no attributes.| |`System`|`vbSystem`|除了指定没有属性的文件，还指定系统文件。Specifies system files, in addition to files that have no attributes.| |`Volume`|`vbVolume`|指定卷标;如果指定任何其他属性， `vbVolume` 则将忽略。Specifies volume label; if any other attribute is specified, `vbVolume` is ignored.| |`Directory`|`vbDirectory`|指定目录或文件夹，以及没有属性的文件。Specifies directories or folders, in addition to files that have no attributes.| |`Archive`|`vbArchive`|文件自上次备份后已更改。File has changed since last backup.| |`Alias`|`vbAlias`|文件具有不同的名称。File has a different name.| > [!NOTE] > 这些枚举由 Visual Basic 语言指定，并且可以在代码中的任何位置使用来代替实际值。These enumerations are specified by the Visual Basic language and can be used anywhere in your code in place of the actual values. ## Examples 此示例使用 `Dir` 函数检查是否存在特定的文件和目录。This example uses the `Dir` function to check if certain files and directories exist. summary.span: 当达到为进行 或顺序 而打开的文件的结尾时，此方法返回布尔值 。

span.span: Returns a Boolean value when the end of a file opened for or sequential has been reached.

returns.span: 当达到为进行 或顺序 而打开的文件的结尾时，为布尔值 。

span.span: A Boolean value when the end of a file opened for or sequential has been reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 `EOF` 可避免由于尝试获取超过文件结尾的输入而生成的错误。Use `EOF` to avoid the error generated by attempting to get input past the end of a file. `EOF`函数将返回， `False` 直到到达文件末尾。The `EOF` function returns `False` until the end of the file has been reached. 对于打开 `Random` 或访问的文件 `Binary` ， `EOF` 返回 `False` 直到最后执行的 `FileGet` 函数无法读取整个记录。With files opened for `Random` or `Binary` access, `EOF` returns `False` until the last executed `FileGet` function is unable to read a whole record. 使用打开的文件进行 `Binary` 访问时，在返回之前，尝试使用函数读取文件将 `Input` `EOF` `True` 生成错误。With files opened for `Binary` access, an attempt to read through the file using the `Input` function until `EOF` returns `True` generates an error. 使用 `LOF` 和 `Loc` 函数（而不是 `EOF` 读取二进制文件时使用 `Input` ），或使用 `Get` 函数时使用 `EOF` 。Use the `LOF` and `Loc` functions instead of `EOF` when reading binary files with `Input`, or use `Get` when using the `EOF` function. 对于为打开的文件 `Output` ， `EOF` 始终返回 `True` 。With files opened for `Output`, `EOF` always returns `True`. ## Examples 此示例使用 `EOF` 函数来检测文件的结尾。This example uses the `EOF` function to detect the end of a file. 此示例假设 `Testfile` 是包含多行文本的文本文件。This example assumes that `Testfile` is a text file that contains several lines of text. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#62](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#62)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileClose`提供函数是为了向后兼容，可能会影响性能。The `FileClose` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧版应用程序， `My.Computer.FileSystem` 对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：使用 StreamReader 读取文件](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-text-from-files-with-a-streamreader)中的文本、 [如何：使用 StreamWriter 向文件中写入文本](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-text-to-files-with-a-streamwriter)和 [演练：操作 Visual Basic 中的文件和目录](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/walkthrough-manipulating-files-and-directories)。For more information, see [How to: Read Text from Files with a StreamReader](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-text-from-files-with-a-streamreader), [How to: Write Text to Files with a StreamWriter](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-text-to-files-with-a-streamwriter), and [Walkthrough: Manipulating Files and Directories in Visual Basic](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/walkthrough-manipulating-files-and-directories). 如果省略 `FileNumbers` ，则函数打开的所有活动文件 `FileOpen` 都将关闭。If you omit `FileNumbers`, all active files opened by the `FileOpen` function are closed. 关闭已为或打开的文件时 `Output` `Append` ，最终的输出缓冲区会写入该文件的操作系统缓冲区。When you close files that were opened for `Output` or `Append`, the final buffer of output is written to the operating system buffer for that file. 与关闭的文件关联的所有缓冲区空间都将释放。All buffer space associated with the closed file is released. `FileClose`执行函数时，文件与文件编号的关联将结束。When the `FileClose` function is executed, the association of a file with its file number ends. ## Examples 此示例使用 `FileClose` 函数关闭为打开的文件 `Input` 。This example uses the `FileClose` function to close a file opened for `Input`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#69](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#69)]

static member FileGet : int * bool * int64 -> unit
.method public static void FileGet(int32 FileNumber, bool& Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed

param.name: Value
param.span: 数据读入到其中的有效变量名称。

span.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 读取的开始位置处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节数（ 模式文件）。

summary.span: 将数据从打开的磁盘文件读入到一个变量中。

span.span: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 仅在 `Random` 和 `Binary` 模式下有效。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 使用读取的数据 `FileGet` 通常写入到文件 `FilePut` 中。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file with `FilePut`. 文件中的第一个记录或字节位于位置1，第二个记录或字节在位置2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略 `RecordNumber` ，则读取最后一个函数或函数之后的下一个记录或字节 `FileGet` `FilePut` (或最后一个 `Seek` 函数) 。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 从文件中读取时，请不要根据文件扩展名来决定文件的内容。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 "Form1" 的文件可能不是 Visual Basic 的源文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 随机模式Random Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Random` ，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果读取的数据的长度小于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` `FileGet` 读取记录长度边界的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开头之间的空格将填充到文件缓冲区的现有内容中。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能确定填充数据量，因此通常最好让记录长度与读取的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 默认情况下，如果要读入的变量是字符串，则 `FileGet` 读取包含字符串长度的双字节说明符，然后读取进入该变量的数据。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，函数的子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为大于字符串实际长度的两个字节。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本支持固定长度字符串;放到文件中时，不写入长度说明符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果要读取没有说明符的字符串，应传递 `True` 到 `StringIsFixedLength` 参数，并且读入的字符串应为正确的长度。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量是数组，则可以选择是否读取数组的大小和维度的说明符。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要编写描述符，请将 `ArrayIsDynamic` 参数设置为 `True` 。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 读取数组时，必须匹配数组的写入方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果使用描述符编写，则必须读取描述符。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果未使用该说明符，则传递到的数组的大小和界限 `FileGet` 确定要读取的内容。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，当数组写入磁盘时，以下数组声明需要218字节。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218字节分布如下：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述符的18个字节： (2 + 8 \* 2) 18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200字节用于数据： (5 \* 10 \* 4) 。200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果读入的变量是 (不是可变长度字符串或对象) 的任何其他类型的变量，则 `FileGet` 只读取变量数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于要读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 读取结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独读取的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型中的动态数组 (用) 编写， `FilePut` 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中的子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于读取单个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组及其说明符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可应用到结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，大部分 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在模式下打开的文件的以下规则 `Binary` 不同于模式的规则 `Random` ：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续读取磁盘中的所有变量;也就是说，记录之间不进行填充。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FileGet` 只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取长度可变的字符串，该字符串不是结构的元素，不需要双字节长度说明符。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用函数从文件读取 `FileGet` 需要 `Read` 从 枚举访问。Reading from a file by using the`FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本支持固定长度字符串;放到文件中时，不写入长度说明符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果要读取没有说明符的字符串，应传递 `True` 到 `StringIsFixedLength` 参数，并且读入的字符串应为正确的长度。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量是数组，则可以选择是否读取数组的大小和维度的说明符。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要编写描述符，请将 `ArrayIsDynamic` 参数设置为 `True` 。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 读取数组时，必须匹配数组的写入方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果使用描述符编写，则必须读取描述符。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果未使用描述符，则为。If the descriptor is not used. 然后，传递到的数组的大小和界限 `FileGet` 确定要读取的内容。Then the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，当数组写入磁盘时，以下数组声明需要218字节。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218字节分布如下：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述符的18个字节： (2 + 8 \* 2) 18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200字节用于数据： (5 \* 10 \* 4) 。200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果读入的变量是 (不是可变长度字符串或对象) 的任何其他类型的变量，则 `FileGet` 只读取变量数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于要读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 读取结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独读取的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型中的动态数组 (用) 编写， `FilePut` 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中的子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于读取单个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组及其说明符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可应用到结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，大部分 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在模式下打开的文件的以下规则 `Binary` 不同于模式的规则 `Random` ：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续读取磁盘中的所有变量;也就是说，记录之间不进行填充。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FileGet` 只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取长度可变的字符串，该字符串不是结构的元素，不需要双字节长度说明符。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用函数从文件读取 `FileGet` 需要 `Read` 从 枚举访问。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FileGet (int FileNumber, ref char Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static hidebysig void FileGet(int32 FileNumber, char& Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FileGet (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As Char, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FileGet : int * char * int64 -> unit
.method public static void FileGet(int32 FileNumber, char& Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed

param.name: Value
param.span: 数据读入到其中的有效变量名称。

span.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 读取的开始位置处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节数（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which reading starts.

summary.span: 将数据从打开的磁盘文件读入到一个变量中。

span.span: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 仅在 `Random` 和 `Binary` 模式下有效。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 使用读取的数据 `FileGet` 通常写入到文件 `FilePut` 中。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file with `FilePut`. 文件中的第一个记录或字节位于位置1，第二个记录或字节在位置2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略 `RecordNumber` ，则读取最后一个函数或函数之后的下一个记录或字节 `FileGet` `FilePut` (或最后一个 `Seek` 函数) 。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 从文件中读取时，请不要根据文件扩展名来决定文件的内容。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 "Form1" 的文件可能不是 Visual Basic 的源文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 随机模式Random Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Random` ，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果读取的数据的长度小于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` `FileGet` 读取记录长度边界的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开头之间的空格将填充到文件缓冲区的现有内容中。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能确定填充数据量，因此通常最好让记录长度与读取的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 默认情况下，如果要读入的变量是字符串，则 `FileGet` 读取包含字符串长度的双字节说明符，然后读取进入该变量的数据。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，函数的子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为大于字符串实际长度的两个字节。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本支持固定长度字符串;放到文件中时，不写入长度说明符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果要读取没有说明符的字符串，应传递 `True` 到 `StringIsFixedLength` 参数，并且读入的字符串应为正确的长度。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量是数组，则可以选择是否读取数组的大小和维度的说明符。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要编写描述符，请将 `ArrayIsDynamic` 参数设置为 `True` 。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 读取数组时，必须匹配数组的写入方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果使用描述符编写，则必须读取描述符。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果未使用该说明符，则传递到的数组的大小和界限 `FileGet` 确定要读取的内容。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，当数组写入磁盘时，以下数组声明需要218字节。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218字节分布如下：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述符的18个字节： (2 + 8 \* 2) 18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200字节用于数据： (5 \* 10 \* 4) 。200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果读入的变量是 (不是可变长度字符串或对象) 的任何其他类型的变量，则 `FileGet` 只读取变量数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于要读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 读取结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独读取的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型中的动态数组 (用) 编写， `FilePut` 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中的子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于读取单个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组及其说明符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可应用到结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，大部分 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在模式下打开的文件的以下规则 `Binary` 不同于模式的规则 `Random` ：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续读取磁盘中的所有变量;也就是说，记录之间不进行填充。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FileGet` 只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取长度可变的字符串，该字符串不是结构的元素，不需要双字节长度说明符。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用函数从文件读取 `FileGet` 需要 `Read` 从 枚举访问。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

`RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续读取磁盘中的所有变量;也就是说，记录之间不进行填充。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FileGet` 只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取长度可变的字符串，该字符串不是结构的元素，不需要双字节长度说明符。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用函数从文件读取 `FileGet` 需要 `Read` 从 枚举访问。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FileGet (int FileNumber, ref decimal Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static hidebysig void FileGet(int32 FileNumber, valuetype System.Decimal& Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FileGet (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As Decimal, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FileGet : int * decimal * int64 -> unit
.method public static void FileGet(int32 FileNumber, valuetype System.Decimal& Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed

param.name: Value
param.span: 数据读入到其中的有效变量名称。

span.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 读取的开始位置处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节数（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which reading starts.

summary.span: 将数据从打开的磁盘文件读入到一个变量中。

span.span: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 仅在 `Random` 和 `Binary` 模式下有效。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 使用读取的数据 `FileGet` 通常通过使用写入到文件 `FilePut` 。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file by using `FilePut`. 文件中的第一个记录或字节位于位置1，第二个记录或字节在位置2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略 `RecordNumber` ，则读取最后一个函数或函数之后的下一个记录或字节 `FileGet` `FilePut` (或最后一个 `Seek` 函数) 。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 从文件中读取时，请不要根据文件扩展名来决定文件的内容。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 "Form1" 的文件可能不是 Visual Basic 的源文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 随机模式Random Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Random` ，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果读取的数据的长度小于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` `FileGet` 读取记录长度边界的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开头之间的空格将填充到文件缓冲区的现有内容中。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能确定填充数据量，因此通常最好让记录长度与读取的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 默认情况下，如果要读入的变量是字符串，则 `FileGet` 读取包含字符串长度的双字节说明符，然后读取进入该变量的数据。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，函数的子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为大于字符串实际长度的两个字节。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本支持固定长度字符串;放到文件中时，不写入长度说明符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果要读取没有说明符的字符串，应传递 `True` 到 `StringIsFixedLength` 参数，并且读入的字符串应为正确的长度。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量是数组，则可以选择是否读取数组的大小和维度的说明符。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要编写描述符，请将 `ArrayIsDynamic` 参数设置为 `True` 。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 读取数组时，必须匹配数组的写入方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果使用描述符编写，则必须读取描述符。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果未使用该说明符，则传递到的数组的大小和界限 `FileGet` 确定要读取的内容。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，当数组写入磁盘时，以下数组声明需要218字节。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218字节分布如下：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述符的18个字节： (2 + 8 \* 2) 18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200字节用于数据： (5 \* 10 \* 4) 。200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果读入的变量是 (不是可变长度字符串或对象) 的任何其他类型的变量，则 `FileGet` 只读取变量数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于要读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 读取结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独读取的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型中的动态数组 (用) 编写， `FilePut` 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中的子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于读取单个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组及其说明符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可应用到结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，大部分 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在模式下打开的文件的以下规则 `Binary` 不同于模式的规则 `Random` ：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续读取磁盘中的所有变量;也就是说，记录之间不进行填充。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FileGet` 只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取长度可变的字符串，该字符串不是结构的元素，不需要双字节长度说明符。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用函数从文件读取 `FileGet` 需要 `Read` 从 枚举访问。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 仅在 `Random` 和 `Binary` 模式下有效。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 使用读取的数据 `FileGet` 通常通过使用写入到文件 `FilePut` 。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file by using `FilePut`. 文件中的第一个记录或字节位于位置1，第二个记录或字节在位置2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略 `RecordNumber` ，则读取最后一个函数或函数之后的下一个记录或字节 `FileGet` `FilePut` (或最后一个 `Seek` 函数) 。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 从文件中读取时，请不要根据文件扩展名来决定文件的内容。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 "Form1" 的文件可能不是 Visual Basic 的源文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 随机模式Random Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Random` ，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果读取的数据的长度小于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` `FileGet` 读取记录长度边界的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开头之间的空格将填充到文件缓冲区的现有内容中。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能确定填充数据量，因此通常最好让记录长度与读取的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 默认情况下，如果要读入的变量是字符串，则 `FileGet` 读取包含字符串长度的双字节说明符，然后读取进入该变量的数据。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，函数的子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为大于字符串实际长度的两个字节。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本支持固定长度字符串;放到文件中时，不写入长度说明符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果要读取没有说明符的字符串，应传递 `True` 到 `StringIsFixedLength` 参数，并且读入的字符串应为正确的长度。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量是数组，则可以选择是否读取数组的大小和维度的说明符。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要编写描述符，请将 `ArrayIsDynamic` 参数设置为 `True` 。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 读取数组时，必须匹配数组的写入方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果使用描述符编写，则必须读取描述符。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果未使用该说明符，则传递到的数组的大小和界限 `FileGet` 确定要读取的内容。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，当数组写入磁盘时，以下数组声明需要218字节。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218字节分布如下：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述符的18个字节： (2 + 8 \* 2) 18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200字节用于数据： (5 \* 10 \* 4) 。200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果读入的变量是 (不是可变长度字符串或对象) 的任何其他类型的变量，则 `FileGet` 只读取变量数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于要读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 读取结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独读取的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型中的动态数组 (用) 编写， `FilePut` 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中的子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于读取单个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组及其说明符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可应用到结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，大部分 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在模式下打开的文件的以下规则 `Binary` 不同于模式的规则 `Random` ：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续读取磁盘中的所有变量;也就是说，记录之间不进行填充。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FileGet` 只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取长度可变的字符串，该字符串不是结构的元素，不需要双字节长度说明符。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用函数从文件读取 `FileGet` 需要 `Read` 从 枚举访问。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

related.span: 从文件读取 (Visual Basic)

span.span: Reading from Files in Visual Basic

related.span: 写入文件 (Visual Basic)

span.span: Writing to Files in Visual Basic

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FileGet (int FileNumber, ref int Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static hidebysig void FileGet(int32 FileNumber, int32& Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FileGet (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As Integer, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FileGet : int * int * int64 -> unit
.method public static void FileGet(int32 FileNumber, int32& Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed

param.name: Value
param.span: 数据读入到其中的有效变量名称。

span.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 读取的开始位置处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节数（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which reading starts.

summary.span: 将数据从打开的磁盘文件读入到一个变量中。

span.span: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

200字节用于数据： (5 \* 10 \* 4) 。200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果读入的变量是 (不是可变长度字符串或对象) 的任何其他类型的变量，则 `FileGet` 只读取变量数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于要读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 读取结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独读取的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型中的动态数组 (用) 编写， `FilePut` 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中的子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于读取单个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组及其说明符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可应用到结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，大部分 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在模式下打开的文件的以下规则 `Binary` 不同于模式的规则 `Random` ：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续读取磁盘中的所有变量;也就是说，记录之间不进行填充。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FileGet` 只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取长度可变的字符串，该字符串不是结构的元素，不需要双字节长度说明符。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用函数从文件读取 `FileGet` 需要 `Read` 从 枚举访问。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

Public Sub FileGet (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As Single, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FileGet : int * single * int64 -> unit
.method public static void FileGet(int32 FileNumber, float32& Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed

param.name: Value
param.span: 数据读入到其中的有效变量名称。

span.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 读取的开始位置处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节数（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which reading starts.

summary.span: 将数据从打开的磁盘文件读入到一个变量中。

span.span: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 仅在 `Random` 和 `Binary` 模式下有效。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 使用读取的数据 `FileGet` 通常通过使用写入到文件 `FilePut` 。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file by using `FilePut`. 文件中的第一个记录或字节位于位置1，第二个记录或字节在位置2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略 `RecordNumber` ，则读取最后一个函数或函数之后的下一个记录或字节 `FileGet` `FilePut` (或最后一个 `Seek` 函数) 。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 从文件中读取时，请不要根据文件扩展名来决定文件的内容。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 "Form1" 的文件可能不是 Visual Basic 的源文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 随机模式Random Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Random` ，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果读取的数据的长度小于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` `FileGet` 读取记录长度边界的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开头之间的空格将填充到文件缓冲区的现有内容中。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能确定填充数据量，因此通常最好让记录长度与读取的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 默认情况下，如果要读入的变量是字符串，则 `FileGet` 读取包含字符串长度的双字节说明符，然后读取进入该变量的数据。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，函数的子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为大于字符串实际长度的两个字节。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本支持固定长度字符串;放到文件中时，不写入长度说明符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果要读取没有说明符的字符串，应传递 `True` 到 `StringIsFixedLength` 参数，并且读入的字符串应为正确的长度。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量是数组，则可以选择是否读取数组的大小和维度的说明符。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要编写描述符，请将 `ArrayIsDynamic` 参数设置为 `True` 。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 读取数组时，必须匹配数组的写入方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果使用描述符编写，则必须读取描述符。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果未使用该说明符，则传递到的数组的大小和界限 `FileGet` 确定要读取的内容。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，当数组写入磁盘时，以下数组声明需要218字节。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218字节分布如下：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述符的18个字节： (2 + 8 \* 2) 18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200字节用于数据： (5 \* 10 \* 4) 。200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果读入的变量是 (不是可变长度字符串或对象) 的任何其他类型的变量，则 `FileGet` 只读取变量数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于要读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 读取结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独读取的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型中的动态数组 (用) 编写， `FilePut` 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中的子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于读取单个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组及其说明符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可应用到结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，大部分 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在模式下打开的文件的以下规则 `Binary` 不同于模式的规则 `Random` ：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续读取磁盘中的所有变量;也就是说，记录之间不进行填充。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FileGet` 只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取长度可变的字符串，该字符串不是结构的元素，不需要双字节长度说明符。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用函数从文件读取 `FileGet` 需要 `Read` 从 枚举访问。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

`RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续读取磁盘中的所有变量;也就是说，记录之间不进行填充。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FileGet` 只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取长度可变的字符串，该字符串不是结构的元素，不需要双字节长度说明符。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用函数从文件读取 `FileGet` 需要 `Read` 从 枚举访问。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 仅在 `Random` 和 `Binary` 模式下有效。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 使用读取的数据 `FileGet` 通常通过使用写入到文件 `FilePut` 。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file by using `FilePut`. 文件中的第一个记录或字节位于位置1，第二个记录或字节在位置2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略 `RecordNumber` ，则读取最后一个函数或函数之后的下一个记录或字节 `FileGet` `FilePut` (或最后一个 `Seek` 函数) 。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 从文件中读取时，请不要根据文件扩展名来决定文件的内容。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 "Form1" 的文件可能不是 Visual Basic 的源文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 随机模式Random Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Random` ，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果读取的数据的长度小于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` `FileGet` 读取记录长度边界的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开头之间的空格将填充到文件缓冲区的现有内容中。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能确定填充数据量，因此通常最好让记录长度与读取的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 默认情况下，如果要读入的变量是字符串，则 `FileGet` 读取包含字符串长度的双字节说明符，然后读取进入该变量的数据。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，函数的子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为大于字符串实际长度的两个字节。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本支持固定长度字符串;放到文件中时，不写入长度说明符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果要读取没有说明符的字符串，应传递 `True` 到 `StringIsFixedLength` 参数，并且读入的字符串应为正确的长度。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量是数组，则可以选择是否读取数组的大小和维度的说明符。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要编写描述符，请将 `ArrayIsDynamic` 参数设置为 `True` 。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 读取数组时，必须匹配数组的写入方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果使用描述符编写，则必须读取描述符。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果未使用该说明符，则传递到的数组的大小和界限 `FileGet` 确定要读取的内容。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，当数组写入磁盘时，以下数组声明需要218字节。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218字节分布如下：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述符的18个字节： (2 + 8 \* 2) 18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200字节用于数据： (5 \* 10 \* 4) 。200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果读入的变量是 (不是可变长度字符串或对象) 的任何其他类型的变量，则 `FileGet` 只读取变量数据。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于要读取的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 读取结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独读取的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型中的动态数组 (用) 编写， `FilePut` 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中的子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于读取单个元素所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 这包括任何数组及其说明符。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`特性可应用到结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，大部分 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在模式下打开的文件的以下规则 `Binary` 不同于模式的规则 `Random` ：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 连续读取磁盘中的所有变量;也就是说，记录之间不进行填充。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FileGet` 只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 未读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 读取长度可变的字符串，该字符串不是结构的元素，不需要双字节长度说明符。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用函数从文件读取 `FileGet` 需要 `Read` 从 枚举访问。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGetObject` `FileGet` 如果 `Object` 返回类型而不是另一种类型（如、、等），则使用函数而不是以避免编译时的歧义 `Integer` `Long` `Short` 。The `FileGetObject` function is used instead of `FileGet` to avoid ambiguities at compile time if type `Object` is returned instead of another type, such as `Integer`, `Long`, `Short`, and so forth. 如果打算写出 `Variant` 类型， `FileGetObject` 则是必需的。If you intend to write out the `Variant` type, `FileGetObject` is required. 当不确定时，如果使用第二个参数的对象，则始终建议使用 `FilePutObject` 和 `FileGetObject` 。When in doubt, if you are using an object for the second parameter, it is always suggested that you use `FilePutObject` and `FileGetObject`. `FileGetObject` 仅在 `Random` 和 `Binary` 模式下有效。`FileGetObject` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 用读取的数据 `FileGetObject` 通常用来编写 `FilePutObject` 。Data read with `FileGetObject` is usually written with `FilePutObject`. 文件中的第一个记录或字节位于位置1，第二个记录或字节在位置2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略 `RecordNumber` ，则 `FileGetObject` 读取最后一个 or 函数之后的记录或字节 `FileGetObject` `FilePutObject` (或最后一个 `Seek` 函数) 指向的。If you omit `RecordNumber`, `FileGetObject` reads the record or byte after the last `FileGetObject` or `FilePutObject` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function). ## 随机模式Random Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Random` ，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果读取的数据的长度小于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` `FileGetObject` 读取记录长度边界的后续记录。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGetObject` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开头之间的空格将填充到文件缓冲区的现有内容中。The space between the end of one record and the beginning of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于无法精确确定填充数据量，因此最好让记录长度与所读取的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be precisely determined, it is a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 如果读入的变量是一个字符串，则默认情况下会 `FileGetObject` 读取包含字符串长度的双字节说明符，然后读取进入该变量的数据。If the variable being read into is a string, by default `FileGetObject` reads a two-byte descriptor containing the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，函数的子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为大于字符串实际长度的两个字节。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本支持固定长度字符串，读取文件时，不写入长度说明符。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings and when read to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果要读取没有说明符的字符串，应传递 `True` 到 `StringIsFixedLength` 参数，并且读入的字符串应为正确的长度。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果读入的变量为数组，则 `RecordLength` 函数中 `FileOpen` 参数指定的记录长度必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。If the variable being read into is an array, then the record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： 2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: 2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions. 例如，当数组写入磁盘时，以下数组声明需要218字节：For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#27)] 分发了 218 个字节，如下所示：为描述符分发了 18 个字节 (2 + 8 \* 2)，为数据分发了 100 个字节 (5 \* 10 \* 4)。The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: 18 bytes for the descriptor (2 + 8 \* 2), and 100 bytes for the data (5 \* 10 \* 4). - `FileGetObject` 读取结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独读取的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FileGetObject` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁盘上，用户定义类型中的动态数组 (使用) 编写， `FilePutObject` 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： 2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePutObject`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: 2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于读取单个元素所需的所有字节的总和，包括任何数组及其说明符。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements, including any arrays and their descriptors. 类可应用于结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The class can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of string when written to disk. ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，所有 `Random` 规则均适用，但有以下例外：For files opened in `Binary` mode, all of the `Random` rules apply, with these exceptions: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGetObject` 连续读取磁盘中的所有变量，即没有记录之间的空白。`FileGetObject` reads all variables from disk contiguously, that is, with no padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FileGetObject` 只读取数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGetObject` reads only the data. 未读取任何说明符。No descriptor is read. `FileGetObject` 读取长度可变的字符串，该字符串不是结构的元素，不需要双字节长度说明符。`FileGetObject` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 读取的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 从文件中读取时，请不要根据文件扩展名来决定文件的内容。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 "Form1" 的文件可能不是 Visual Basic 的源文件。For example, a file named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## Examples 下面的示例将记录读入测试文件中，然后检索该记录。The following example reads a record into a test file and then retrieves it. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#26)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果调用函数时指定的文件处于打开状态 `FileLen` ，则返回的值表示文件在打开时的大小。If the specified file is open when the `FileLen` function is called, the value returned represents the size of the file at the time it was opened. > [!NOTE] > 若要获取打开文件的当前长度，请使用 `LOF` 函数。To obtain the current length of an open file, use the `LOF` function. ## Examples 此示例使用 `FileLen` 函数返回文件的长度（以字节为单位）。This example uses the `FileLen` function to return the length of a file in bytes. 出于本示例的目的，假定 `TestFile` 是包含一些数据的文件。For purposes of this example, assume that `TestFile` is a file that contains some data. remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileOpen`提供函数是为了向后兼容，可能会影响性能。The `FileOpen` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧版应用程序， `My.Computer.FileSystem` 对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [使用 Visual Basic 进行文件访问](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access). 必须先打开文件，然后才能对其执行任何 i/o 操作。You must open a file before any I/O operation can be performed on it. `FileOpen` 为文件的 i/o 分配一个缓冲区，并确定与该缓冲区一起使用的访问模式。`FileOpen` allocates a buffer for I/O to the file and determines the mode of access to use with the buffer. > [!IMPORTANT] > 写入文件时，如果尝试写入文件的文件不存在，则应用程序可能需要创建一个文件。When writing to a file, an application may have to create a file, if the file to which it is trying to write does not exist. 为此，需要对要在其中创建文件的目录具有权限。To do so, it needs permission for the directory in which the file is to be created. 但是，如果由指定的文件 `FileName` 存在，则应用程序 `Write` 只需要文件本身的权限。However, if the file specified by `FileName` does exist, the application needs `Write` permission only to the file itself. 如果可能，在部署过程中创建文件并仅授予对 `Write` 该文件的权限（而不是整个目录），以帮助提高安全性。Wherever possible, to help improve security, create the file during deployment and grant `Write` permission to that file only, instead of to the whole directory. 为了帮助提高安全性，请将数据写入用户目录，而不是写入到根目录或 Program Files 目录。To help improve security, write data to user directories instead of to the root directory or the Program Files directory. 可以通过使用函数找到要打开的通道 `FreeFile()` 。The channel to open can be found by using the `FreeFile()` function. > [!IMPORTANT] > `FileOpen`函数需要 `Read` 从 `FileIOPermissionAccess` 枚举访问，这可能会影响在部分信任情况下的执行。The `FileOpen` function requires `Read` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration, which may affect its execution in partial trust situations. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see enumeration. ## Examples 此示例演示了如何使用 `FileOpen` 函数来启用文件的输入和输出。This example illustrates various uses of the `FileOpen` function to enable input and output to a file. 下面的代码 `TestFile` 在 `Input` 模式下打开文件。The following code opens the file `TestFile` in `Input` mode. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 此示例将在模式中打开文件 `Binary` ，仅用于写入操作。This example opens the file in `Binary` mode for writing operations only. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 下面的示例在 `Random` 模式下打开文件。The following example opens the file in `Random` mode. 文件包含结构的记录 `Person` 。The file contains records of the structure `Person`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#7)] 此代码示例在 `Output` 模式下打开文件; 任何进程都可以读取或写入文件。This code example opens the file in `Output` mode; any process can read or write to file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#8)] 此代码示例在 `Binary` 读取模式下打开文件; 其他进程无法读取文件。This code example opens the file in `Binary` mode for reading; other processes cannot read file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#9)]
