remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在 `Random` 和 `Binary` 模式下有效。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 文件中的第一个记录或字节位于位置1，第二个记录或字节在位置2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略，则写入最后一个 `RecordNumber` `FileGet` 或 `FilePut` 函数后面或最后一个函数指向的下一个记录或字节 `Seek` 。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制函数是将字符串解释为变量还是固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 当参数为时，不写入长度说明符 `True` 。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果将 `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` 与结合使用 `FilePut` ，则必须使用来执行相同操作 `FileGet` ，并且必须确保将字符串初始化为预期的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Random` ，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果写入的数据的长度小于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` `FilePut` 写入记录长度边界的后续记录。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开头之间的空格将填充到文件缓冲区的现有内容中。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能确定填充数据量，因此通常最好让记录长度与要写入的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果写入的数据的长度大于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是字符串，则 `FilePut` 写入包含字符串长度的双字节说明符，然后写入该变量中的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为两个字节，大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果写入的变量是包含数值类型的对象，则会 `FilePut` 写入两个字节，用于标识对象的， `VarType` 然后写入变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，在编写包含整数的对象时，将 `FilePut` 写入六个字节：两个字节，用于将对象标识为 `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) 和四个包含数据的字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为两个字节，大于存储变量所需的实际字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果要写入的变量是包含字符串的对象，则 `FilePut` 写入一个两个字节说明符，该说明符标识 `VarType(8)` 对象的，一个双字节说明符，指示字符串的长度，然后写入字符串数据。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为4个字节，大于字符串的实际长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果要在不包含说明符的情况下放置字符串，则应将传递 `True` 给 `StringIsFixedLength` 参数，并且读入的字符串应为正确的长度。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果要写入的变量是数组，则可以选择是否为数组的大小和维度编写说明符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本写入动态数组的文件描述符，但不写入固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不写入描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，请将 `ArrayIsDynamic` 参数设置为 `True` 。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 写入数组时，必须匹配读取数组的方式;如果它将使用描述符读取，则必须编写描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，当数组写入磁盘时，以下数组声明需要218字节。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 (不是可变长度字符串或对象) ，则 `FilePut` 只写入变量数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于要写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 编写结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独编写的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可应用到结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 写入磁盘时，具有超过特性指定的字节数的字符串字段 `VBFixedString` 将被截断。String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，大部分 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在模式下打开的文件的以下规则 `Binary` 不同于模式的规则 `Random` ：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 连续将所有变量写入磁盘，也就是说，在记录之间不进行填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FilePut` 只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 写入不包含双字节长度说明符的结构元素的可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下面的语句将11个字节写入第1个文件：For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 使用函数写入文件 `FilePut` 需要 `Write` 从 枚举访问。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用 `FilePut` 函数将数据写入文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 将结构的五个记录 `Person` 写入文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, byte Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static hidebysig void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, unsigned int8 Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As Byte, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FilePut : int * byte * int64 -> unit
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, unsigned int8 Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效变量名，它包含写入磁盘的数据。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 开始写入处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节号（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: 将变量中得数据写入磁盘文件中。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在 `Random` 和 `Binary` 模式下有效。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 文件中的第一个记录或字节位于位置1，第二个记录或字节在位置2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略，则写入最后一个 `RecordNumber` `FileGet` 或 `FilePut` 函数后面或最后一个函数指向的下一个记录或字节 `Seek` 。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制函数是将字符串解释为变量还是固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 当参数为时，不写入长度说明符 `True` 。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果将 `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` 与结合使用 `FilePut` ，则必须使用来执行相同操作 `FileGet` ，并且必须确保将字符串初始化为预期的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Random` ，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果写入的数据的长度小于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` `FilePut` 写入记录长度边界的后续记录。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开头之间的空格将填充到文件缓冲区的现有内容中。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能确定填充数据量，因此通常最好让记录长度与要写入的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果写入的数据的长度大于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是字符串，则 `FilePut` 写入包含字符串长度的双字节说明符，然后写入该变量中的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为两个字节，大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果写入的变量是包含数值类型的对象，则会 `FilePut` 写入两个字节，用于标识对象的， `VarType` 然后写入变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，在编写包含整数的对象时，将 `FilePut` 写入六个字节：两个字节，用于将对象标识为 `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) 和四个包含数据的字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为两个字节，大于存储变量所需的实际字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果要写入的变量是包含字符串的对象，则 `FilePut` 写入一个两个字节说明符，该说明符标识 `VarType(8)` 对象的，一个双字节说明符，指示字符串的长度，然后写入字符串数据。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为4个字节，大于字符串的实际长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果要在不包含说明符的情况下放置字符串，则应将传递 `True` 给 `StringIsFixedLength` 参数，并且读入的字符串应为正确的长度。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果要写入的变量是数组，则可以选择是否为数组的大小和维度编写说明符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本写入动态数组的文件描述符，但不写入固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不写入描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，请将 `ArrayIsDynamic` 参数设置为 `True` 。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 写入数组时，必须匹配读取数组的方式;如果它将使用描述符读取，则必须编写描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，当数组写入磁盘时，以下数组声明需要218字节。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 (不是可变长度字符串或对象) ，则 `FilePut` 只写入变量数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于要写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 编写结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独编写的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可应用到结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 写入磁盘时，具有超过特性指定的字节数的字符串字段 `VBFixedString` 将被截断。String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，大部分 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在模式下打开的文件的以下规则 `Binary` 不同于模式的规则 `Random` ：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 连续将所有变量写入磁盘，也就是说，在记录之间不进行填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FilePut` 只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 写入不包含双字节长度说明符的结构元素的可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下面的语句将11个字节写入第1个文件：For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 使用函数写入文件 `FilePut` 需要 `Write` 从 枚举访问。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用 `FilePut` 函数将数据写入文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 将结构的五个记录 `Person` 写入文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

如果要写入的变量是数组，则可以选择是否为数组的大小和维度编写说明符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本写入动态数组的文件描述符，但不写入固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不写入描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，请将 `ArrayIsDynamic` 参数设置为 `True` 。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 写入数组时，必须匹配读取数组的方式;如果它将使用描述符读取，则必须编写描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，当数组写入磁盘时，以下数组声明需要218字节。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 (不是可变长度字符串或对象) ，则 `FilePut` 只写入变量数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于要写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 编写结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独编写的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可应用到结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 写入磁盘时，具有超过特性指定的字节数的字符串字段 `VBFixedString` 将被截断。String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，大部分 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在模式下打开的文件的以下规则 `Binary` 不同于模式的规则 `Random` ：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 连续将所有变量写入磁盘，也就是说，在记录之间不进行填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FilePut` 只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 写入不包含双字节长度说明符的结构元素的可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下面的语句将11个字节写入第1个文件：For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 使用函数写入文件 `FilePut` 需要 `Write` 从 枚举访问。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用 `FilePut` 函数将数据写入文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 将结构的五个记录 `Person` 写入文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, DateTime Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static hidebysig void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, valuetype System.DateTime Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As DateTime, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FilePut : int * DateTime * int64 -> unit
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, valuetype System.DateTime Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效变量名，它包含写入磁盘的数据。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 开始写入处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节号（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: 将变量中得数据写入磁盘文件中。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在 `Random` 和 `Binary` 模式下有效。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 文件中的第一个记录或字节位于位置1，第二个记录或字节在位置2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略，则写入最后一个 `RecordNumber` `FileGet` 或 `FilePut` 函数后面或最后一个函数指向的下一个记录或字节 `Seek` 。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制函数是将字符串解释为变量还是固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 当参数为时，不写入长度说明符 `True` 。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果将 `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` 与结合使用 `FilePut` ，则必须使用来执行相同操作 `FileGet` ，并且必须确保将字符串初始化为预期的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Random` ，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果写入的数据的长度小于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` `FilePut` 写入记录长度边界的后续记录。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开头之间的空格将填充到文件缓冲区的现有内容中。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能确定填充数据量，因此通常最好让记录长度与要写入的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果写入的数据的长度大于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是字符串，则 `FilePut` 写入包含字符串长度的双字节说明符，然后写入该变量中的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为两个字节，大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果写入的变量是包含数值类型的对象，则会 `FilePut` 写入两个字节，用于标识对象的， `VarType` 然后写入变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，在编写包含整数的对象时，将 `FilePut` 写入六个字节：两个字节，用于将对象标识为 `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) 和四个包含数据的字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为两个字节，大于存储变量所需的实际字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果要写入的变量是包含字符串的对象，则 `FilePut` 写入一个两个字节说明符，该说明符标识 `VarType(8)` 对象的，一个双字节说明符，指示字符串的长度，然后写入字符串数据。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为4个字节，大于字符串的实际长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果要在不包含说明符的情况下放置字符串，则应将传递 `True` 给 `StringIsFixedLength` 参数，并且读入的字符串应为正确的长度。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果要写入的变量是数组，则可以选择是否为数组的大小和维度编写说明符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本写入动态数组的文件描述符，但不写入固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不写入描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，请将 `ArrayIsDynamic` 参数设置为 `True` 。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 写入数组时，必须匹配读取数组的方式;如果它将使用描述符读取，则必须编写描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，当数组写入磁盘时，以下数组声明需要218字节。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 (不是可变长度字符串或对象) ，则 `FilePut` 只写入变量数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于要写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 编写结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独编写的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可应用到结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 写入磁盘时，具有超过特性指定的字节数的字符串字段 `VBFixedString` 将被截断。String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，大部分 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在模式下打开的文件的以下规则 `Binary` 不同于模式的规则 `Random` ：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 连续将所有变量写入磁盘，也就是说，在记录之间不进行填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FilePut` 只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 写入不包含双字节长度说明符的结构元素的可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下面的语句将11个字节写入第1个文件：For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 使用函数写入文件 `FilePut` 需要 `Write` 从 枚举访问。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用 `FilePut` 函数将数据写入文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 将结构的五个记录 `Person` 写入文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

如果要写入的变量是数组，则可以选择是否为数组的大小和维度编写说明符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本写入动态数组的文件描述符，但不写入固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不写入描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，请将 `ArrayIsDynamic` 参数设置为 `True` 。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 写入数组时，必须匹配读取数组的方式;如果它将使用描述符读取，则必须编写描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，当数组写入磁盘时，以下数组声明需要218字节。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 (不是可变长度字符串或对象) ，则 `FilePut` 只写入变量数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于要写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 编写结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独编写的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可应用到结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 写入磁盘时，具有超过特性指定的字节数的字符串字段 `VBFixedString` 将被截断。String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，大部分 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在模式下打开的文件的以下规则 `Binary` 不同于模式的规则 `Random` ：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 连续将所有变量写入磁盘，也就是说，在记录之间不进行填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FilePut` 只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 写入不包含双字节长度说明符的结构元素的可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下面的语句将11个字节写入第1个文件：For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 使用函数写入文件 `FilePut` 需要 `Write` 从 枚举访问。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用 `FilePut` 函数将数据写入文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 将结构的五个记录 `Person` 写入文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, double Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static hidebysig void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, float64 Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As Double, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FilePut : int * double * int64 -> unit
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, float64 Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效变量名，它包含写入磁盘的数据。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 开始写入处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节号（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: 将变量中得数据写入磁盘文件中。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在 `Random` 和 `Binary` 模式下有效。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 文件中的第一个记录或字节位于位置1，第二个记录或字节在位置2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略，则写入最后一个 `RecordNumber` `FileGet` 或 `FilePut` 函数后面或最后一个函数指向的下一个记录或字节 `Seek` 。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制函数是将字符串解释为变量还是固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 当参数为时，不写入长度说明符 `True` 。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果将 `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` 与结合使用 `FilePut` ，则必须使用来执行相同操作 `FileGet` ，并且必须确保将字符串初始化为预期的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Random` ，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果写入的数据的长度小于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` `FilePut` 写入记录长度边界的后续记录。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开头之间的空格将填充到文件缓冲区的现有内容中。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能确定填充数据量，因此通常最好让记录长度与要写入的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果写入的数据的长度大于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是字符串，则 `FilePut` 写入包含字符串长度的双字节说明符，然后写入该变量中的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为两个字节，大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果写入的变量是包含数值类型的对象，则会 `FilePut` 写入两个字节，用于标识对象的， `VarType` 然后写入变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，在编写包含整数的对象时，将 `FilePut` 写入六个字节：两个字节，用于将对象标识为 `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) 和四个包含数据的字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为两个字节，大于存储变量所需的实际字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果要写入的变量是包含字符串的对象，则 `FilePut` 写入一个两个字节说明符，该说明符标识 `VarType(8)` 对象的，一个双字节说明符，指示字符串的长度，然后写入字符串数据。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为4个字节，大于字符串的实际长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果要在不包含说明符的情况下放置字符串，则应将传递 `True` 给 `StringIsFixedLength` 参数，并且读入的字符串应为正确的长度。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果要写入的变量是数组，则可以选择是否为数组的大小和维度编写说明符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本写入动态数组的文件描述符，但不写入固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不写入描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，请将 `ArrayIsDynamic` 参数设置为 `True` 。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 写入数组时，必须匹配读取数组的方式;如果它将使用描述符读取，则必须编写描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，当数组写入磁盘时，以下数组声明需要218字节。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 (不是可变长度字符串或对象) ，则 `FilePut` 只写入变量数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于要写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 编写结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独编写的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可应用到结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 写入磁盘时，具有超过特性指定的字节数的字符串字段 `VBFixedString` 将被截断。String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，大部分 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在模式下打开的文件的以下规则 `Binary` 不同于模式的规则 `Random` ：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 连续将所有变量写入磁盘，也就是说，在记录之间不进行填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FilePut` 只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 写入不包含双字节长度说明符的结构元素的可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下面的语句将11个字节写入第1个文件：For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 使用函数写入文件 `FilePut` 需要 `Write` 从 枚举访问。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用 `FilePut` 函数将数据写入文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 将结构的五个记录 `Person` 写入文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

如果要写入的变量是数组，则可以选择是否为数组的大小和维度编写说明符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本写入动态数组的文件描述符，但不写入固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不写入描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，请将 `ArrayIsDynamic` 参数设置为 `True` 。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 写入数组时，必须匹配读取数组的方式;如果它将使用描述符读取，则必须编写描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，当数组写入磁盘时，以下数组声明需要218字节。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 (不是可变长度字符串或对象) ，则 `FilePut` 只写入变量数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于要写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 编写结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独编写的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可应用到结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 写入磁盘时，具有超过特性指定的字节数的字符串字段 `VBFixedString` 将被截断。String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，大部分 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在模式下打开的文件的以下规则 `Binary` 不同于模式的规则 `Random` ：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 连续将所有变量写入磁盘，也就是说，在记录之间不进行填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FilePut` 只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 写入不包含双字节长度说明符的结构元素的可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下面的语句将11个字节写入第1个文件：For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 使用函数写入文件 `FilePut` 需要 `Write` 从 枚举访问。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用 `FilePut` 函数将数据写入文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 将结构的五个记录 `Person` 写入文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

span.span: Writing to Files in Visual Basic

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, int Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static hidebysig void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, int32 Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As Integer, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FilePut : int * int * int64 -> unit
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, int32 Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效变量名，它包含写入磁盘的数据。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 开始写入处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节号（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: 将变量中得数据写入磁盘文件中。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在 `Random` 和 `Binary` 模式下有效。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 文件中的第一个记录或字节位于位置1，第二个记录或字节在位置2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略，则写入最后一个 `RecordNumber` `FileGet` 或 `FilePut` 函数后面或最后一个函数指向的下一个记录或字节 `Seek` 。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制函数是将字符串解释为变量还是固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 当参数为时，不写入长度说明符 `True` 。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果将 `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` 与结合使用 `FilePut` ，则必须使用来执行相同操作 `FileGet` ，并且必须确保将字符串初始化为预期的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Random` ，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果写入的数据的长度小于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` `FilePut` 写入记录长度边界的后续记录。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开头之间的空格将填充到文件缓冲区的现有内容中。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能确定填充数据量，因此通常最好让记录长度与要写入的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果写入的数据的长度大于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是字符串，则 `FilePut` 写入包含字符串长度的双字节说明符，然后写入该变量中的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为两个字节，大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果写入的变量是包含数值类型的对象，则会 `FilePut` 写入两个字节，用于标识对象的， `VarType` 然后写入变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，在编写包含整数的对象时，将 `FilePut` 写入六个字节：两个字节，用于将对象标识为 `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) 和四个包含数据的字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为两个字节，大于存储变量所需的实际字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果要写入的变量是包含字符串的对象，则 `FilePut` 写入一个两个字节说明符，该说明符标识 `VarType(8)` 对象的，一个双字节说明符，指示字符串的长度，然后写入字符串数据。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为4个字节，大于字符串的实际长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果要在不包含说明符的情况下放置字符串，则应将传递 `True` 给 `StringIsFixedLength` 参数，并且读入的字符串应为正确的长度。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果要写入的变量是数组，则可以选择是否为数组的大小和维度编写说明符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本写入动态数组的文件描述符，但不写入固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不写入描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，请将 `ArrayIsDynamic` 参数设置为 `True` 。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 写入数组时，必须匹配读取数组的方式;如果它将使用描述符读取，则必须编写描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，当数组写入磁盘时，以下数组声明需要218字节。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 (不是可变长度字符串或对象) ，则 `FilePut` 只写入变量数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于要写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 编写结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独编写的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可应用到结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 写入磁盘时，具有超过特性指定的字节数的字符串字段 `VBFixedString` 将被截断。String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，大部分 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在模式下打开的文件的以下规则 `Binary` 不同于模式的规则 `Random` ：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 连续将所有变量写入磁盘，也就是说，在记录之间不进行填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FilePut` 只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 写入不包含双字节长度说明符的结构元素的可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下面的语句将11个字节写入第1个文件：For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 使用函数写入文件 `FilePut` 需要 `Write` 从 枚举访问。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用 `FilePut` 函数将数据写入文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 将结构的五个记录 `Person` 写入文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

如果要写入的变量是数组，则可以选择是否为数组的大小和维度编写说明符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本写入动态数组的文件描述符，但不写入固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不写入描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，请将 `ArrayIsDynamic` 参数设置为 `True` 。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 写入数组时，必须匹配读取数组的方式;如果它将使用描述符读取，则必须编写描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，当数组写入磁盘时，以下数组声明需要218字节。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 (不是可变长度字符串或对象) ，则 `FilePut` 只写入变量数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于要写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 编写结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独编写的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可应用到结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 写入磁盘时，具有超过特性指定的字节数的字符串字段 `VBFixedString` 将被截断。String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，大部分 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在模式下打开的文件的以下规则 `Binary` 不同于模式的规则 `Random` ：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 连续将所有变量写入磁盘，也就是说，在记录之间不进行填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FilePut` 只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 写入不包含双字节长度说明符的结构元素的可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下面的语句将11个字节写入第1个文件：For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 使用函数写入文件 `FilePut` 需要 `Write` 从 枚举访问。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用 `FilePut` 函数将数据写入文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 将结构的五个记录 `Person` 写入文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, float Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static hidebysig void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, float32 Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As Single, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FilePut : int * single * int64 -> unit
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, float32 Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效变量名，它包含写入磁盘的数据。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 开始写入处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节号（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: 将变量中得数据写入磁盘文件中。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在 `Random` 和 `Binary` 模式下有效。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 文件中的第一个记录或字节位于位置1，第二个记录或字节在位置2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略，则写入最后一个 `RecordNumber` `FileGet` 或 `FilePut` 函数后面或最后一个函数指向的下一个记录或字节 `Seek` 。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制函数是将字符串解释为变量还是固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 当参数为时，不写入长度说明符 `True` 。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果将 `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` 与结合使用 `FilePut` ，则必须使用来执行相同操作 `FileGet` ，并且必须确保将字符串初始化为预期的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Random` ，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果写入的数据的长度小于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` `FilePut` 写入记录长度边界的后续记录。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开头之间的空格将填充到文件缓冲区的现有内容中。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能确定填充数据量，因此通常最好让记录长度与要写入的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果写入的数据的长度大于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是字符串，则 `FilePut` 写入包含字符串长度的双字节说明符，然后写入该变量中的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为两个字节，大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果写入的变量是包含数值类型的对象，则会 `FilePut` 写入两个字节，用于标识对象的， `VarType` 然后写入变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，在编写包含整数的对象时，将 `FilePut` 写入六个字节：两个字节，用于将对象标识为 `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) 和四个包含数据的字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为两个字节，大于存储变量所需的实际字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果要写入的变量是包含字符串的对象，则 `FilePut` 写入一个两个字节说明符，该说明符标识 `VarType(8)` 对象的，一个双字节说明符，指示字符串的长度，然后写入字符串数据。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为4个字节，大于字符串的实际长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果要在不包含说明符的情况下放置字符串，则应将传递 `True` 给 `StringIsFixedLength` 参数，并且读入的字符串应为正确的长度。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果要写入的变量是数组，则可以选择是否为数组的大小和维度编写说明符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本写入动态数组的文件描述符，但不写入固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不写入描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，请将 `ArrayIsDynamic` 参数设置为 `True` 。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 写入数组时，必须匹配读取数组的方式;如果它将使用描述符读取，则必须编写描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，当数组写入磁盘时，以下数组声明需要218字节。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 (不是可变长度字符串或对象) ，则 `FilePut` 只写入变量数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于要写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 编写结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独编写的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可应用到结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 写入磁盘时，具有超过特性指定的字节数的字符串字段 `VBFixedString` 将被截断。String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，大部分 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在模式下打开的文件的以下规则 `Binary` 不同于模式的规则 `Random` ：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 连续将所有变量写入磁盘，也就是说，在记录之间不进行填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FilePut` 只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 写入不包含双字节长度说明符的结构元素的可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下面的语句将11个字节写入第1个文件：For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 使用函数写入文件 `FilePut` 需要 `Write` 从 枚举访问。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用 `FilePut` 函数将数据写入文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 将结构的五个记录 `Person` 写入文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

如果要写入的变量是数组，则可以选择是否为数组的大小和维度编写说明符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本写入动态数组的文件描述符，但不写入固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不写入描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，请将 `ArrayIsDynamic` 参数设置为 `True` 。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 写入数组时，必须匹配读取数组的方式;如果它将使用描述符读取，则必须编写描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，当数组写入磁盘时，以下数组声明需要218字节。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 (不是可变长度字符串或对象) ，则 `FilePut` 只写入变量数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于要写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 编写结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独编写的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可应用到结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 写入磁盘时，具有超过特性指定的字节数的字符串字段 `VBFixedString` 将被截断。String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，大部分 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在模式下打开的文件的以下规则 `Binary` 不同于模式的规则 `Random` ：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 连续将所有变量写入磁盘，也就是说，在记录之间不进行填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FilePut` 只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 写入不包含双字节长度说明符的结构元素的可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下面的语句将11个字节写入第1个文件：For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 使用函数写入文件 `FilePut` 需要 `Write` 从 枚举访问。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用 `FilePut` 函数将数据写入文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 将结构的五个记录 `Person` 写入文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]
