param.name: Value
param.span: 有效变量名，它包含写入磁盘的数据。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 开始写入处的记录号（ 模式文件）或字节号（ 模式文件）。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: 将变量中得数据写入磁盘文件中。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在 `Random` 和 `Binary` 模式下有效。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 文件中的第一个记录或字节位于位置1，第二个记录或字节在位置2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略，则写入最后一个 `RecordNumber` `FileGet` 或 `FilePut` 函数后面或最后一个函数指向的下一个记录或字节 `Seek` 。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制函数是将字符串解释为变量还是固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 当参数为时，不写入长度说明符 `True` 。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果将 `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` 与结合使用 `FilePut` ，则必须使用来执行相同操作 `FileGet` ，并且必须确保将字符串初始化为预期的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Random` ，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果写入的数据的长度小于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` `FilePut` 写入记录长度边界的后续记录。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开头之间的空格将填充到文件缓冲区的现有内容中。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能确定填充数据量，因此通常最好让记录长度与要写入的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果写入的数据的长度大于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是字符串，则 `FilePut` 写入包含字符串长度的双字节说明符，然后写入该变量中的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为两个字节，大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果写入的变量是包含数值类型的对象，则会 `FilePut` 写入两个字节，用于标识对象的， `VarType` 然后写入变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，在编写包含整数的对象时，将 `FilePut` 写入六个字节：两个字节，用于将对象标识为 `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) 和四个包含数据的字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为两个字节，大于存储变量所需的实际字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果要写入的变量是包含字符串的对象，则 `FilePut` 写入一个两个字节说明符，该说明符标识 `VarType(8)` 对象的，一个双字节说明符，指示字符串的长度，然后写入字符串数据。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为4个字节，大于字符串的实际长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果要在不包含说明符的情况下放置字符串，则应将传递 `True` 给 `StringIsFixedLength` 参数，并且读入的字符串应为正确的长度。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果要写入的变量是数组，则可以选择是否为数组的大小和维度编写说明符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本写入动态数组的文件描述符，但不写入固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不写入描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，请将 `ArrayIsDynamic` 参数设置为 `True` 。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 写入数组时，必须匹配读取数组的方式;如果它将使用描述符读取，则必须编写描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，当数组写入磁盘时，以下数组声明需要218字节。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 (不是可变长度字符串或对象) ，则 `FilePut` 只写入变量数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于要写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 编写结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独编写的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可应用到结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 写入磁盘时，具有超过特性指定的字节数的字符串字段 `VBFixedString` 将被截断。String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，大部分 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在模式下打开的文件的以下规则 `Binary` 不同于模式的规则 `Random` ：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 连续将所有变量写入磁盘，也就是说，在记录之间不进行填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FilePut` 只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 写入不包含双字节长度说明符的结构元素的可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下面的语句将11个字节写入第1个文件：For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 使用函数写入文件 `FilePut` 需要 `Write` 从 枚举访问。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用 `FilePut` 函数将数据写入文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 将结构的五个记录 `Person` 写入文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

如果要写入的变量是包含字符串的对象，则 `FilePut` 写入一个两个字节说明符，该说明符标识 `VarType(8)` 对象的，一个双字节说明符，指示字符串的长度，然后写入字符串数据。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为4个字节，大于字符串的实际长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果要在不包含说明符的情况下放置字符串，则应将传递 `True` 给 `StringIsFixedLength` 参数，并且读入的字符串应为正确的长度。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果要写入的变量是数组，则可以选择是否为数组的大小和维度编写说明符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本写入动态数组的文件描述符，但不写入固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不写入描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，请将 `ArrayIsDynamic` 参数设置为 `True` 。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 写入数组时，必须匹配读取数组的方式;如果它将使用描述符读取，则必须编写描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，当数组写入磁盘时，以下数组声明需要218字节。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 (不是可变长度字符串或对象) ，则 `FilePut` 只写入变量数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于要写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 编写结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独编写的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可应用到结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 写入磁盘时，具有超过特性指定的字节数的字符串字段 `VBFixedString` 将被截断。String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，大部分 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在模式下打开的文件的以下规则 `Binary` 不同于模式的规则 `Random` ：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 连续将所有变量写入磁盘，也就是说，在记录之间不进行填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FilePut` 只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 写入不包含双字节长度说明符的结构元素的可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下面的语句将11个字节写入第1个文件：For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 使用函数写入文件 `FilePut` 需要 `Write` 从 枚举访问。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用 `FilePut` 函数将数据写入文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 将结构的五个记录 `Person` 写入文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

span.span: Applies only when writing an array.

param.name: StringIsFixedLength
param.span: 仅在写入字符串时适用。

span.span: Applies only when writing a string.

param.span: 指定是否将字符串的双字节字符串长度说明符写入文件中。

span.span: Specifies whether to write a two-byte string length descriptor for the string to the file.

summary.span: 将变量中得数据写入磁盘文件中。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 仅在 `Random` 和 `Binary` 模式下有效。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGet` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePut` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 文件中的第一个记录或字节位于位置1，第二个记录或字节在位置2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略，则写入最后一个 `RecordNumber` `FileGet` 或 `FilePut` 函数后面或最后一个函数指向的下一个记录或字节 `Seek` 。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制函数是将字符串解释为变量还是固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 当参数为时，不写入长度说明符 `True` 。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果将 `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` 与结合使用 `FilePut` ，则必须使用来执行相同操作 `FileGet` ，并且必须确保将字符串初始化为预期的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Random` ，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果写入的数据的长度小于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` `FilePut` 写入记录长度边界的后续记录。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开头之间的空格将填充到文件缓冲区的现有内容中。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能确定填充数据量，因此通常最好让记录长度与要写入的数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果写入的数据的长度大于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 将引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果写入的变量是字符串，则 `FilePut` 写入包含字符串长度的双字节说明符，然后写入该变量中的数据。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为两个字节，大于字符串的实际长度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果写入的变量是包含数值类型的对象，则会 `FilePut` 写入两个字节，用于标识对象的， `VarType` 然后写入变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，在编写包含整数的对象时，将 `FilePut` 写入六个字节：两个字节，用于将对象标识为 `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) 和四个包含数据的字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为两个字节，大于存储变量所需的实际字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果要写入的变量是包含字符串的对象，则 `FilePut` 写入一个两个字节说明符，该说明符标识 `VarType(8)` 对象的，一个双字节说明符，指示字符串的长度，然后写入字符串数据。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为4个字节，大于字符串的实际长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果要在不包含说明符的情况下放置字符串，则应将传递 `True` 给 `StringIsFixedLength` 参数，并且读入的字符串应为正确的长度。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果要写入的变量是数组，则可以选择是否为数组的大小和维度编写说明符。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 及更早版本写入动态数组的文件描述符，但不写入固定大小的数组。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 默认为不写入描述符。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要编写描述符，请将 `ArrayIsDynamic` 参数设置为 `True` 。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 写入数组时，必须匹配读取数组的方式;如果它将使用描述符读取，则必须编写描述符。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符所需的所有字节之和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 例如，当数组写入磁盘时，以下数组声明需要218字节。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果写入的变量是任何其他类型的变量 (不是可变长度字符串或对象) ，则 `FilePut` 只写入变量数据。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 函数中子句指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须大于或等于要写入的数据的长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 编写结构的元素，就好像每个元素都是单独编写的，只不过元素之间没有空白。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`特性可应用到结构中的字符串字段，以指示写入磁盘时字符串的大小。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 写入磁盘时，具有超过特性指定的字节数的字符串字段 `VBFixedString` 将被截断。String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，大部分 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但有一些例外情况。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在模式下打开的文件的以下规则 `Binary` 不同于模式的规则 `Random` ：The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 连续将所有变量写入磁盘，也就是说，在记录之间不进行填充。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 对于结构中除数组以外的任何数组， `FilePut` 只写入数据。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 不写入任何说明符。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 写入不包含双字节长度说明符的结构元素的可变长度字符串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 写入的字节数等于字符串中的字符数。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下面的语句将11个字节写入第1个文件：For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 使用函数写入文件 `FilePut` 需要 `Write` 从 枚举访问。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用 `FilePut` 函数将数据写入文件。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 将结构的五个记录 `Person` 写入文件。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePutObject` `FilePut` 如果 `Object` 传递类型而不是另一种类型（如、、等），则使用函数而不是来避免编译时出现歧义 `Integer` `Long` `Short` 。The `FilePutObject` function is used instead of `FilePut` to avoid ambiguities at compile time if type `Object` is passed instead of another type, such as `Integer`, `Long`, `Short`, and so forth. `FilePutObject` 写入和读取描述对象的描述符。`FilePutObject` writes and reads descriptors that describe the object. 如果打算写出 `Variant` 类型， `FilePutObject` 则是必需的。If you intend to write out the `Variant` type, `FilePutObject` is required. 当不确定时，如果使用第二个参数的对象，我们建议始终使用 `FilePutObject` 和 `FileGetObject` 。When in doubt, if you are using an object for the second parameter, we recommend that you always use `FilePutObject` and `FileGetObject`. `FilePutObject` 仅在 `Random` 和 `Binary` 模式下有效。`FilePutObject` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 通常使用 `FileGetObject` 从文件中读取使用 `FilePutObject` 编写的数据。Data written with `FilePutObject` is usually read from a file by using `FileGetObject`. 文件中的第一个记录或字节位于位置1，第二个记录或字节在位置2，依此类推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果省略，则在 `RecordNumber` `FilePutObject` 最后一个 `FileGetObject` 或 `FilePutObject` 函数 (或最后一个函数) 指向的记录或字节后写入下一条记录或字节 `Seek` 。If you omit `RecordNumber`, `FilePutObject` writes the next record or byte after the last `FileGetObject` or `FilePutObject` function (or the record or byte pointed to by the last `Seek` function). `StringIsFixedLength`参数控制函数是将字符串解释为变量还是固定长度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePutObject` 当参数为时，不写入长度说明符 `True` 。`FilePutObject` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果将 `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` 与结合使用 `FilePutObject` ，则必须使用来执行相同操作 `FileGetObject` ，并且还必须确保将字符串初始化为预期的长度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePutObject`, you have to do the same with `FileGetObject`, and you must also make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 随机模式Random Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Random` ，以下规则适用：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果写入的数据的长度小于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` `FilePutObject` 写入记录长度边界的后续记录。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePutObject` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 一条记录的末尾和下一条记录的开头之间的空格将填充到文件缓冲区的现有内容中。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 由于不能准确确定填充数据量，因此最好将记录长度与所写入数据的长度匹配。Because the amount of padding data cannot be precisely determined, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果写入的数据的长度大于函数的子句中指定的长度，则 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 会引发异常。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception is thrown. - 如果写入的变量是包含数值类型的对象，则会 `FilePutObject` 写入两个字节，用于标识对象的， `VarType` 然后写入变量。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePutObject` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 例如，在编写包含整数的对象时，将 `FilePutObject` 写入六个字节：两个字节，用于将对象标识为 `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) 和四个包含数据的字节。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePutObject` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为两个字节，大于存储变量所需的实际字节数。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果写入的变量是包含字符串的对象，则 `FilePutObject` 写入一个双字节说明符，该说明符标识 `VarType(8)` 对象的，两个字节的说明符指示字符串的长度，然后写入字符串数据。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePutObject` writes a two-byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 函数中参数指定的记录长度 `RecordLength` `FileOpen` 必须至少为4个字节，大于字符串的实际长度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果要在不包含说明符的情况下放置字符串，则应将传递 `True` 给 `StringIsFixedLength` 参数，并且读入的字符串应为正确的长度。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果写入的变量为数组，则 `RecordLength` 函数中 `FileOpen` 子句指定的记录长度必须大于或等于写入数组数据和数组描述符需要的所有字节之和。If the variable being written is an array, then the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 描述符指定数组的秩、大小和每个排名的下限。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其长度等于2再加上维度数的8倍： (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions) 。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). ## 二进制模式Binary Mode 对于以模式打开的文件 `Binary` ，所有 `Random` 模式规则均适用，但以下情况除外：For files opened in `Binary` mode, all the `Random` mode rules apply, except: - `RecordLength`函数中的子句无效 `FileOpen` 。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePutObject` 连续将所有变量写入磁盘，也就是说，在记录之间不进行填充。`FilePutObject` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. ## Examples 此示例使用 `FilePutObject` 函数将字符串写入文件。This example uses the `FilePutObject` function to write a string to a file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#54](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#54)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定设置了哪些特性，请使用 `And` 运算符来执行函数返回的值的按位比较 `GetAttr` 以及所需的单个文件特性的值。To determine which attributes are set, use the `And` operator to perform a bitwise comparison of the value returned by the `GetAttr` function and the value of the individual file attribute you want. 如果结果不为零，则为命名文件设置该属性。If the result is not zero, that attribute is set for the named file. 例如， `And` 如果未设置该属性，则以下表达式的返回值为零 `Archive` ：For example, the return value of the following `And` expression is zero if the `Archive` attribute is not set: ```vb Result = GetAttr(FName) And vbArchive ``` 如果设置了属性，则返回一个非零值 `Archive` 。A nonzero value is returned if the `Archive` attribute is set. ## Examples 此示例使用 `GetAttr` 函数来确定文件和目录或文件夹的属性。This example uses the `GetAttr` function to determine the attributes of a file and directory or folder. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#25)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Input (int FileNumber, ref bool Value);
.method public static hidebysig void Input(int32 FileNumber, bool& Value) cil managed
Public Sub Input (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As Boolean)
public: static void Input(int FileNumber, bool % Value);
static member Input : int * bool -> unit
.method public static void Input(int32 FileNumber, bool& Value) cil managed

param.name: Value
param.span: 被赋以从文件中读取的值的变量不能是数组或对象变量。

span.span: Variable that is assigned the values read from the file - cannot be an array or object variable.

summary.span: 读取打开的顺序文件中的数据，并将这些数据赋值给变量。

span.span: Reads data from an open sequential file and assigns the data to variables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Input`提供函数是为了向后兼容，可能会影响性能。The `Input` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧版应用程序， `My.Computer.FileSystem` 对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [使用 Visual Basic 进行文件访问](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access). 使用读取的数据 `Input` 通常通过使用写入到文件 `Write` 。Data read with `Input` is usually written to a file by using `Write`. 仅将此函数用于以或模式打开的文件 `Input` `Binary` 。Use this function only with files opened in `Input` or `Binary` mode. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在从文件中读取时，请不要根据文件扩展名来决定文件的内容。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of the file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 "Form1" 的文件可能不是 Visual Basic 2005 的源文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic 2005 source file. 在读取时，不修改标准字符串或数值数据，而是将其分配给变量。When read, standard string or numeric data is assigned to variables without modification. 下表说明了如何处理其他输入数据。The following table illustrates how other input data is treated. |数据Data|赋给变量的值Value assigned to variable| |-|-| |分隔逗号或空白行Delimiting comma or blank line|空Empty| |#NULL##NULL#|`DBNull`| |#TRUE # 或 #FALSE##TRUE# or #FALSE#|`True` 或 `False``True` or `False`| |#`yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss`#|表达式所表示的日期和/或时间The date and/or time represented by the expression| |#ERROR `errornumber`##ERROR `errornumber`#|`errornumber` (变量是标记为错误的对象) `errornumber` (variable is an object tagged as an error)| 如果在您输入数据项时到达该文件的末尾，则输入将停止并发生错误。If you reach the end of the file while you are inputting a data item, the input is stopped and an error occurs. > [!NOTE] > `Input`函数未本地化。The `Input` function is not localized. 例如，在德语版本中，如果输入3、14159，则它仅返回3，因为逗号被视为变量分隔符，而不是小数点。For example, in the German version, if you input 3,14159, it returns only 3, because the comma is treated as a variable separator instead of as a decimal point. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用函数从文件读取 `Input` 需要 `Read` 从 `FileIOPermissionAccess` 枚举访问。Reading from a file by using the `Input` function requires `Read` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用 `Input` 函数将文件中的数据读入两个变量中。This example uses the `Input` function to read data from a file into two variables. 此示例假定 `TestFile` 是一个文件，它使用函数向其写入了一些数据行 `Write` ，每行包含一个引号中的字符串和一个逗号分隔的数字，例如： ( "Hello"、234) 。This example assumes that `TestFile` is a file that has some lines of data written to it using the `Write` function, each line containing a string in quotations and a number separated by a comma, for example: ("Hello", 234). [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#35)]

或 #FALSE##TRUE# or #FALSE#|`True` 或 `False``True` or `False`| |#`yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss`#|表达式所表示的日期和/或时间The date and/or time represented by the expression| |#ERROR `errornumber`##ERROR `errornumber`#|`errornumber` (变量是标记为错误的对象) `errornumber` (variable is an object tagged as an error)| 如果在您输入数据项时到达该文件的末尾，则输入将停止并发生错误。If you reach the end of the file while you are inputting a data item, the input is stopped and an error occurs. > [!NOTE] > `Input`函数未本地化。The `Input` function is not localized. 例如，在德语版本中，如果输入3、14159，则它仅返回3，因为逗号被视为变量分隔符，而不是小数点。For example, in the German version, if you input 3,14159, it returns only 3, because the comma is treated as a variable separator instead of as a decimal point. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用函数从文件读取 `Input` 需要 `Read` 从 `FileIOPermissionAccess` 枚举访问。Reading from a file by using the `Input` function requires `Read` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用 `Input` 函数将文件中的数据读入两个变量中。This example uses the `Input` function to read data from a file into two variables. 此示例假定 `TestFile` 是一个文件，它使用函数向其写入了一些数据行 `Write` ，每行包含一个引号中的字符串和一个逗号分隔的数字，例如： ( "Hello"、234) 。This example assumes that `TestFile` is a file that has some lines of data written to it using the `Write` function, each line containing a string in quotations and a number separated by a comma, for example: ("Hello", 234). remarks.format: ## Remarks `Input`提供函数是为了向后兼容，可能会影响性能。The `Input` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧版应用程序， `My.Computer.FileSystem` 对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [使用 Visual Basic 进行文件访问](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access). 使用读取的数据 `Input` 通常通过使用写入到文件 `Write` 。Data read with `Input` is usually written to a file by using `Write`. 仅将此函数用于以或模式打开的文件 `Input` `Binary` 。Use this function only with files opened in `Input` or `Binary` mode. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在从文件中读取时，请不要根据文件扩展名来决定文件的内容。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of the file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 "Form1" 的文件可能不是 Visual Basic 2005 的源文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic 2005 source file. 在读取时，不修改标准字符串或数值数据，而是将其分配给变量。When read, standard string or numeric data is assigned to variables without modification. 下表说明了如何处理其他输入数据。The following table illustrates how other input data is treated. |数据Data|赋给变量的值Value assigned to variable| |-|-| |分隔逗号或空白行Delimiting comma or blank line|空Empty| |#NULL##NULL#|`DBNull`| |#TRUE # 或 #FALSE##TRUE# or #FALSE#|`True` 或 `False``True` or `False`| |#`yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss`#|表达式所表示的日期和/或时间The date and/or time represented by the expression| |#ERROR `errornumber`##ERROR `errornumber`#|`errornumber` (变量是标记为错误的对象) `errornumber` (variable is an object tagged as an error)| 如果在您输入数据项时到达该文件的末尾，则输入将停止并发生错误。If you reach the end of the file while you are inputting a data item, the input is stopped and an error occurs. > [!NOTE] > `Input`函数未本地化。The `Input` function is not localized. 例如，在德语版本中，如果输入3、14159，则它仅返回3，因为逗号被视为变量分隔符，而不是小数点。For example, in the German version, if you input 3,14159, it returns only 3, because the comma is treated as a variable separator instead of as a decimal point. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用函数从文件读取 `Input` 需要 `Read` 从 `FileIOPermissionAccess` 枚举访问。Reading from a file by using the `Input` function requires `Read` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用 `Input` 函数将文件中的数据读入两个变量中。This example uses the `Input` function to read data from a file into two variables. 此示例假定 `TestFile` 是一个文件，它使用函数向其中写入多行数据 `Write` ，每行包含一个字符串，引号和一个用逗号分隔的数字，例如： ( "Hello"，234) 。This example assumes that `TestFile` is a file that has several lines of data written to it using the `Write` function, each line containing a string in quotations and a number separated by a comma, for example: ("Hello", 234). [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#35)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Input`提供函数是为了向后兼容，可能会影响性能。The `Input` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧版应用程序， `My.Computer.FileSystem` 对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [使用 Visual Basic 进行文件访问](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access). 使用读取的数据 `Input` 通常通过使用写入到文件 `Write` 。Data read with `Input` is usually written to a file by using `Write`. 仅将此函数用于以或模式打开的文件 `Input` `Binary` 。Use this function only with files opened in `Input` or `Binary` mode. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在从文件中读取时，请不要根据文件扩展名来决定文件的内容。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of the file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 "Form1" 的文件可能不是 Visual Basic 2005 的源文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic 2005 source file. 在读取时，不修改标准字符串或数值数据，而是将其分配给变量。When read, standard string or numeric data is assigned to variables without modification. 下表说明了如何处理其他输入数据。The following table illustrates how other input data is treated. |数据Data|赋给变量的值Value assigned to variable| |-|-| |分隔逗号或空白行Delimiting comma or blank line|空Empty| |#NULL##NULL#|`DBNull`| |#TRUE # 或 #FALSE##TRUE# or #FALSE#|`True` 或 `False``True` or `False`| |#`yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss`#|表达式所表示的日期和/或时间The date and/or time represented by the expression| |#ERROR `errornumber`##ERROR `errornumber`#|`errornumber` (变量是标记为错误的对象) `errornumber` (variable is an object tagged as an error)| 如果在您输入数据项时到达该文件的末尾，则输入将停止并发生错误。If you reach the end of the file while you are inputting a data item, the input is stopped and an error occurs. > [!NOTE] > `Input`函数未本地化。The `Input` function is not localized. 例如，在德语版本中，如果输入3、14159，则它仅返回3，因为逗号被视为变量分隔符，而不是小数点。For example, in the German version, if you input 3,14159, it returns only 3, because the comma is treated as a variable separator instead of as a decimal point. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用函数从文件读取 `Input` 需要 `Read` 从 `FileIOPermissionAccess` 枚举访问。Reading from a file by using the `Input` function requires `Read` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用 `Input` 函数将文件中的数据读入两个变量中。This example uses the `Input` function to read data from a file into two variables. 此示例假定 `TestFile` 是一个文件，它使用函数向其中写入多行数据 `Write` ，每行包含一个字符串，引号和一个用逗号分隔的数字，例如： ( "Hello"，234) 。This example assumes that `TestFile` is a file that has several lines of data written to it using the `Write` function, each line containing a string in quotations and a number separated by a comma, for example: ("Hello", 234). [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#35)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static string InputString (int FileNumber, int CharCount);
.method public static hidebysig string InputString(int32 FileNumber, int32 CharCount) cil managed
Public Function InputString (FileNumber As Integer, CharCount As Integer) As String
public: static System::String ^ InputString(int FileNumber, int CharCount);
static member InputString : int * int -> string
.method public static string InputString(int32 FileNumber, int32 CharCount) cil managed

param.name: CharCount
param.span: 用于指定要读取的字符数的任何有效数值表达式。

span.span: Any valid numeric expression specifying the number of characters to read.

summary.span: 返回 值，该值包含以 或 模式打开的文件中的字符。

span.span: Returns value that contains characters from a file opened in or mode.

summary.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 。

returns.span: 一个字符串，该字符串包含以 或 模式打开的文件中的字符。

span.span: A string that contains characters from a file opened in or mode.

returns.span: 相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `InputString`提供函数是为了向后兼容，可能会影响性能。The `InputString` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧版应用程序， `My.Computer.FileSystem` 对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [使用 Visual Basic 进行文件访问](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access). 使用函数读取的数据 `InputString` 通常使用或写入文件 `Print` `FilePut` 。Data read with the `InputString` function is usually written to a file by using `Print` or `FilePut`. 仅将此函数用于以或模式打开的文件 `Input` `Binary` 。Use this function only with files opened in `Input` or `Binary` mode. 与 `Input` 函数不同， `InputString` 函数返回它读取的所有字符。Unlike the `Input` function, the `InputString` function returns all the characters it reads. 这包括逗号、回车符、换行符、引号和前导空格。This includes commas, carriage returns, line feeds, quotation marks, and leading spaces. 使用打开的文件进行 `Binary` 访问时，在返回之前，尝试使用函数读取文件将 `InputString` `EOF` `True` 生成错误。With files opened for `Binary` access, an attempt to read through the file by using the `InputString` function until `EOF` returns `True` generates an error. 使用 `LOF` 和 `Loc` 函数（而不是 `EOF` ）通过使用读取二进制文件时使用 `InputString` ，或使用 `FileGet` 函数时使用 `EOF` 。Use the `LOF` and `Loc` functions instead of `EOF` when you read binary files by using `InputString`, or use `FileGet` when you use the `EOF` function. > [!NOTE] > 在从文件中读取时，不要根据文件扩展名对文件内容做出安全决策。When reading from files, do not make security decisions about the contents of the file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 "Form1" 的文件可能不是 Visual Basic 的源文件。For example, a file named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## Examples 此示例使用 `InputString` 函数从文件中一次读取一个字符，然后将其打印到窗口中 `Output` 。This example uses the `InputString` function to read one character at a time from a file and print it to the `Output` window. 此示例假设 `MyFile` 是包含多行示例数据的文本文件。This example assumes that `MyFile` is a text file that has several lines of sample data. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#33)]

param.name: PathName
param.span: 指定要删除的一个或多个文件名的字符串表达式。

span.span: A string expression that specifies one or more file names to be deleted.

summary.span: 从磁盘中删除文件。
相比 ， 功能可使文件 I/O 操作的效率更高、性能更好。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Kill` 支持使用多字符 (`*`) 和单字符 (`?`) 通配符来指定多个文件。`Kill` supports the use of multiple-character (`*`) and single-character (`?`) wildcards to specify multiple files. **安全说明** 若要执行，该 `Kill` 函数需要 `Read` 和 `PathDiscovery` 的标志才能 向执行代码授予。**Security Note** In order to execute, the `Kill` function requires `Read` and `PathDiscovery` flags of to be granted to the executing code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [代码访问权限](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)For more information, see [Code Access Permissions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675) ## Examples 此示例使用 `Kill` 函数从磁盘中删除文件。This example uses the `Kill` function to delete a file from a disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#60](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#60)]

summary.span: 从打开的顺序文件中读取一行并将其赋值给一个 变量。

span.span: Reads a single line from an open sequential file and assigns it to a variable.

returns.span: 从打开的顺序文件中读取一行并将其赋值给一个 变量。

span.span: Reads a single line from an open sequential file and assigns it to a variable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `LineInput`提供函数是为了向后兼容，可能会影响性能。The `LineInput` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧版应用程序， `My.Computer.FileSystem` 对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [使用 Visual Basic 进行文件访问](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access). 使用读取的数据 `LineInput` 通常通过使用写入到文件 `Print` 。Data read with `LineInput` is usually written to a file by using `Print`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 从文件中读取时，请不要根据文件扩展名来决定文件的内容。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名为 "Form1" 的文件可能不是 Visual Basic 的源文件。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. `LineInput`函数每次从一个文件中读取一个字符，直到它遇到 `Chr(13)`) 或回车符/换行符 () 序列的 (回车符 `Chr(13) + Chr(10)` 。The `LineInput` function reads from a file one character at a time until it encounters a carriage return (`Chr(13)`) or carriage return/line feed (`Chr(13) + Chr(10)`) sequence. 将跳过回车符/换行符，而不是追加到字符串。Carriage return/line feed sequences are skipped instead of appended to the character string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用函数从文件读取 `LineInput` 需要 `Read` 从 枚举访问。Reading from a file by using the `LineInput` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 此示例使用 `LineInput` 函数从顺序文件中读取一行，并将其分配给变量。This example uses the `LineInput` function to read a line from a sequential file and assign it to a variable. 此示例假设 `TestFile` 是包含多行示例数据的文本文件。This example assumes that `TestFile` is a text file that has several lines of sample data. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#19)]

span.span: The current read/write position in an open file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Loc`函数从零开始; 使用它检索文件中的第一个字节时，将返回0。The `Loc` function is zero-based; using it to retrieve the first byte in a file will return 0. `Loc`提供函数是为了向后兼容，可能会影响性能。The `Loc` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧版应用程序， `My.Computer.FileSystem` 对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [使用 Visual Basic 进行文件访问](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access). 下面说明了每个文件访问模式的返回值：The following describes the return value for each file access mode: |模式Mode|返回值Return value| |-|-| |`Random`|读取或写入文件的最后一条记录的编号。Number of the last record read from or written to the file.| |`Sequential`|文件中的当前字节位置除以128。Current byte position in the file divided by 128. 但是，不 `Loc` 使用也不需要为顺序文件返回的信息。However, information returned by `Loc` for sequential files is neither used nor required.| |`Binary`|上次读取或写入字节的位置。Position of the last byte read or written.| ## Examples 此示例使用 `Loc` 函数返回打开的文件中的当前读/写位置。This example uses the `Loc` function to return the current read/write position in an open file. 此示例假设 `MyFile` 是包含多行示例数据的文本文件。This example assumes that `MyFile` is a text file that has several lines of sample data. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#17)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Lock`和 `Unlock` 函数在多个进程可能需要访问同一文件的环境中使用。The `Lock` and `Unlock` functions are used in environments where several processes might need access to the same file. `Lock` 和 `Unlock` 函数始终成对使用。`Lock` and `Unlock` functions are always used in pairs. 和的参数 `Lock` `Unlock` 必须完全相同。The arguments to `Lock` and `Unlock` must be identical. 如果 `Record` `FromRecord` 未提供、或且 `ToRecord` 未提供，则将为整个文件锁定。If `Record`, or `FromRecord` and `ToRecord` are not supplied, the lock will be for the whole file. 如果 `Record` 单独指定，则将锁定/解锁单个记录。If `Record` alone is specified the single record will be locked/unlocked. 如果文件已打开以进行顺序输入或输出，则 `Lock` `Unlock` 会影响整个文件，而不考虑和指定的范围 `FromRecord` `ToRecord` 。If the file has been opened for sequential input or output, `Lock` and `Unlock` affect the whole file, regardless of the range specified by `FromRecord` and`ToRecord`. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 `Lock` 和 `Unlock` 函数。This example illustrates the use of the `Lock` and `Unlock` functions. 此示例假定 `People.txt` 是包含结构的记录的文件 `Person` 。This example assumes that `People.txt` is a file that contains records of the structure `Person`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#13)]

span.span: Writes display-formatted data to a sequential file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Print`提供和 `PrintLine` 函数是为了向后兼容，可能会影响性能。The `Print` and `PrintLine` functions are provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧版应用程序， `My.Computer.FileSystem` 对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [使用 Visual Basic 进行文件访问](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access). `Print` 不在行尾包含换行符;不过， `PrintLine` 确实包含换行。`Print` does not include a line feed at the end of a line; however, `PrintLine` does include a line feed. `Print`通常使用或从文件中读取使用编写的数据 `LineInput` `Input` 。Data written with `Print` is usually read from a file by using `LineInput` or `Input`. 如果省略 `Output` 了 `PrintLine` ，则会在文件中打印空白行; 对于 `Print` ，不会输出任何内容。If you omit `Output` for `PrintLine`, a blank line is printed to the file; for `Print`, nothing is output. 用逗号分隔的多个表达式将在制表符边界上对齐，但混合使用逗号， `TAB` 可能导致不一致的结果。Multiple expressions separated with a comma will be aligned on tab boundaries, but mixing commas and `TAB` may cause inconsistent results. 对于 `Boolean` 数据，可以是 `True` 或 `False` 。For `Boolean` data, either `True` or `False` is printed. `True` `False` 不会转换和关键字，无论区域设置如何。The `True` and `False` keywords are not translated, regardless of the locale. 使用系统识别的标准短日期格式将日期数据写入文件。Date data is written to the file by using the standard short date format recognized by your system. 当日期或时间部分缺失或为零时，只将提供的部分写入文件中。When either the date or the time component is missing or zero, only the part provided is written to the file. 如果数据为空，则不向文件写入任何内容 `Output` 。Nothing is written to the file if `Output` data is empty. 但是，如果 `Output` 列表数据为 `DBNull` ， `Null` 将写入文件。However, if `Output` list data is `DBNull`, `Null` is written to the file. 对于 `Error` 数据，输出显示为 `Error errorcode` 。For `Error` data, the output appears as `Error errorcode`. `Error`无论区域设置如何，都不会转换关键字。The `Error` keyword is not translated regardless of the locale. 使用写入到文件中的所有数据 `Print` 都是可以识别的，也就是说，使用适当的小数点分隔符正确设置数据的格式。All data written to the file by using `Print` is internationally aware; that is, the data is correctly formatted using the appropriate decimal separator. 如果用户希望输出由多个区域设置使用的数据，则 `Write` 应使用。If the user wishes to output data for use by multiple locales, `Write` should be used. 使用 `Print` 或函数写入文件 `PrintLine` 需要 `Write` 枚举中的访问权限 `FileIOPermissionAccess` 。Writing to a file by using the `Print` or `PrintLine` functions requires `Write` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用 `Print` 和 `PrintLine` 函数将数据写入文件。This example uses the `Print` and `PrintLine` functions to write data to a file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#53](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#53)]

however,`PrintLine` does include a line feed. `Print`通常使用或从文件中读取使用编写的数据 `LineInput` `Input` 。Data written with `Print` is usually read from a file by using `LineInput` or `Input`. 如果省略 `Output` 了 `PrintLine` ，则会在文件中打印空白行; that is, the data is correctly formatted using the appropriate decimal separator. 如果用户希望输出由多个区域设置使用的数据，则 `Write` 应使用。If the user wishes to output data for use by multiple locales, `Write` should be used. 使用 `Print` 或函数写入文件 `PrintLine` 需要 `Write` 枚举中的访问权限 `FileIOPermissionAccess` 。Writing to a file by using the `Print` or `PrintLine` functions requires `Write` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用 `Print` 和 `PrintLine` 函数将数据写入文件。This example uses the `Print` and `PrintLine` functions to write data to a file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#53](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#53)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Rename`如果需要，函数将重命名文件并将其移动到不同的目录。The`Rename` function renames a file and moves it to a different directory, if it is required. `Rename`函数可以跨驱动器移动文件，但它只能在 `NewPath` 和 `OldPath` 位于同一驱动器上时重命名现有的目录。The `Rename` function can move a file across drives, but it can only rename an existing directory when both `NewPath` and `OldPath` are located on the same drive. `Rename` 无法创建新的文件或目录。`Rename` cannot create a new file or directory. `Rename`对打开的文件使用函数会产生错误。Using the `Rename` function on an open file produces an error. 在重命名之前，必须先关闭打开的文件。You must close an open file before renaming it. `Rename` 参数不能包含多字符 ( \* ) 和单字符 (？ ) 通配符。`Rename` arguments cannot include multiple-character (\*) and single-character (?) wildcards. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当使用将 `Rename` 不受保护的位置中的文件复制到受保护的位置时，该文件将保留有限的权限。When using `Rename` to copy a file from an unprotected location to a protected location, the file retains the less restricted rights. 请检查以确保未引入可能的安全风险。Check to make sure that you are not introducing a possible security risk. ## Examples 此示例使用 `Rename` 函数重命名文件。This example uses the `Rename` function to rename a file. 出于本示例的目的，假定指定的目录已存在。For purposes of this example, assume that the directories that are specified already exist. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#30)]

span.span: A specifying the current read/write position in a file opened by using the function, or sets the position for the next read/write operation in a file opened by using the function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Seek` 返回一个介于1和2147483647之间的值 (等效于 2 ^ 31-1) （包括这两个值）。`Seek` returns a value between 1 and 2,147,483,647 (equivalent to 2^31 - 1), inclusive. 下面说明了每个文件访问模式的返回值：The following describes the return values for each file access mode: |模式Mode|返回值Return Value| |-|-| |`Random`|读取或写入的下一个记录的编号Number of the next record read or written| |`Binary`, `Input`, `Output`, `Append``Binary`, `Input`, `Output`, `Append`|发生下一操作的字节位置。Byte position at which the next operation occurs. 文件中的第一个字节的位置为1，第二个字节在位置2，依此类推。The first byte in a file is at position 1, the second byte is at position 2, and so on.| ## Examples 此示例使用 `Seek` 函数返回当前文件位置。This example uses the `Seek` function to return the current file position. 该示例假设 `TestFile` 是包含结构的记录的文件 `Record` 。The example assumes `TestFile` is a file that contains records of the structure `Record`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#47](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#47)] 对于以模式打开的文件 `Random` ， `Seek` 返回下一条记录的数目。For files opened in `Random` mode, `Seek` returns the number of next record. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#48)] 对于以模式之外的模式打开的文件 `Random` ， `Seek` 返回发生下一操作的字节位置。For files opened in modes other than `Random` mode, `Seek` returns the byte position at which the next operation occurs. 假设 `TestFile` 是包含多行文本的文件。Assume `TestFile` is a file that contains several lines of text. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#49](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#49)] 此示例使用 `Seek` 函数来设置文件中下一次读取或写入的位置。This example uses the `Seek` function to set the position for the next read or write in a file. 对于以模式之外的模式打开的文件 `Random` ， `Seek` 将设置下一操作发生的字节位置。For files opened in modes other than `Random` mode, `Seek` sets the byte position at which the next operation occurs. 假设 `TestFile` 是包含多行文本的文件。Assume `TestFile` is a file that contains several lines of text. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#52](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#52)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尝试设置打开的文件的属性，则会发生运行时错误。A run-time error occurs if you try to set the attributes of an open file. `Attributes`参数枚举值如下所示：The `Attributes` argument enumeration values are as follows: |“值”Value|返回的常量Constant|描述Description| |-|-|-| |`Normal`|`vbNormal`|正常 (默认) 。Normal (default).| |`ReadOnly`|`vbReadOnly`|只读。Read-only.| |`Hidden`|`vbHidden`|隐藏。Hidden.| |`System`|`vbSystem`|系统文件。System file.| |`Volume`|`vbVolume`|卷标Volume label| |`Directory`|`vbDirectory`|目录或文件夹。Directory or folder.| |`Archive`|`vbArchive`|文件自上次备份后已更改。File has changed since last backup.| |`Alias`|`vbAlias`|文件具有不同的名称。File has a different name.| > [!NOTE] > 这些枚举是由 Visual Basic 语言指定的。These enumerations are specified by the Visual Basic language. 可以在代码中的任何位置使用这些名称，而不是实际值。The names can be used anywhere in your code instead of the actual values. ## Examples 此示例使用 `SetAttr` 函数为文件设置属性。This example uses the `SetAttr` function to set attributes for a file. summary.span: 与 或 函数一起使用以定位输出。

span.span: Used with the or function to position output.

returns.span: 与 或 函数一起使用以定位输出。

span.span: Used with the or function to position output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `Count` 小于输出行宽度，则下一个打印位置紧跟打印的空格数。If `Count` is less than the output line width, the next print position immediately follows the number of spaces printed. 如果 `Count` 大于输出行宽度，则 `SPC` 使用公式计算下一个打印位置：If`Count` is greater than the output line width, `SPC` calculates the next print position using the formula: `currentprintposition` (+ (`Count``Mod``width`) # A3`currentprintposition`(+(`Count``Mod``width`)) 例如，如果当前打印位置为24，则输出行宽度为80，并且您指定 `SPC(90)` ，下一次打印将从位置34开始 (当前打印位置 + 90/80) 的剩余部分。For example, if the current print position is 24, the output line width is 80, and you specify `SPC(90)`, the next print will start at position 34 (current print position + the remainder of 90/80). 如果当前打印位置与输出行宽度之间的差异小于 `Count` (或 `Count` `Mod` *width*) ，则 `SPC` 函数将跳到下一行的开头，并生成等于 `Count` - (*width* - *currentprintposition*) 的空格。If the difference between the current print position and the output line width is less than `Count` (or `Count` `Mod` *width*), the `SPC` function skips to the start of the next line and generates spaces equal to `Count` - (*width* - *currentprintposition*). > [!NOTE] > 请确保表格列宽度足以允许宽信。Make sure your tabular columns are wide enough to allow for wide letters. ## Examples 此示例使用 `SPC` 函数将输出定位于文件和 **输出** 窗口中。This example uses the `SPC` function to position output in a file and in the **Output** window. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#16)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前行上的当前打印位置大于 `Column` ，则 `TAB` 跳到 `Column` 下一个输出行的列值等于。If the current print position on the current line is larger than `Column`, `TAB` skips to the column value equal to `Column` on the next output line. 如果 `Column` 小于1，则 `TAB` 将打印位置移动到第1列。If `Column` is less than 1, `TAB` moves the print position to column 1. 如果大于 `Column` 输出行宽度，则 `TAB` 使用公式计算下一个打印位置：If `Column` is larger than the output line width, `TAB` calculates the next print position using the formula: 列 Mod 宽度Column Mod width 例如，如果 *width* 为80，并且您指定 `TAB(90)` 了，则下一次打印将从第10列开始 (90/80) 的剩余部分。For example, if *width* is 80 and you specify `TAB(90)`, the next print will start at column 10 (the remainder of 90/80). 如果 `Column` 小于当前打印位置，则打印将从计算的打印位置的下一行开始。If `Column` is less than the current print position, printing starts on the next line at the calculated print position. 如果计算出的打印位置大于当前打印位置，则打印在同一行的计算打印位置处开始打印。If the calculated print position is larger than the current print position, printing starts at the calculated print position on the same line. 输出行上最左侧的打印位置始终为1。The leftmost print position on an output line is always 1. 使用 `Print` 或 `PrintLine` 函数打印到文件时，最右侧的打印位置是输出文件的当前宽度，可以使用函数进行设置 `FileWidth` 。When you use the `Print` or `PrintLine` functions to print to files, the rightmost print position is the current width of the output file, which you can set using the `FileWidth` function. `TAB`函数还可用于 `WriteLine` 函数。The `TAB` function can also be used with the `WriteLine` function. 它不能与或一起使用 。It cannot be used with or . > [!NOTE] > 请确保表格列的宽度足以容纳宽信。Make sure your tabular columns are wide enough to contain wide letters. ## Examples 此示例使用 `TAB` 函数将输出定位于文件和 **输出** 窗口中。This example uses the `TAB` function to position output in a file and in the **Output** window. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#37](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#37)]

summary.span: 控制其他进程对使用 函数打开的文件的全部或部分的访问。

span.span: Controls access by other processes to all or part of a file opened by using the function.

summary.span: 与 和 相比， 功能在文件 I/O 操作方面可为您提供更高的效率和更好的性能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than and .

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Lock`和 `Unlock` 函数在多个进程可能需要访问同一文件的环境中使用。The `Lock` and `Unlock` functions are used in environments where several processes might need access to the same file. `Lock` 和 `Unlock` 函数始终成对使用。`Lock` and `Unlock` functions are always used in pairs. 和的参数 `Lock` `Unlock` 必须完全相同。The arguments to `Lock` and `Unlock` must be identical. 如果 `Record` `FromRecord` 未提供、或且 `ToRecord` 未提供，则将为整个文件锁定。If `Record`, or `FromRecord` and `ToRecord` are not supplied, the lock will be for the whole file. 如果 `Record` 单独指定，则将锁定/解锁单个记录。If `Record` alone is specified the single record will be locked/unlocked. 如果文件已打开以进行顺序输入或输出，则 `Lock` `Unlock` 会影响整个文件，而不考虑和指定的范围 `FromRecord` `ToRecord` 。If the file has been opened for sequential input or output, `Lock` and `Unlock` affect the whole file, regardless of the range specified by `FromRecord` and`ToRecord`. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 `Lock` 和 `Unlock` 函数。This example illustrates the use of the `Lock` and `Unlock` functions. 此示例假定 `People.txt` 是包含结构的记录的文件 `Person` 。This example assumes that `People.txt` is a file that contains records of the structure `Person`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#13)]

summary.span: 将数据写入一个顺序文件。

span.span: Writes data to a sequential file.

summary.span: 通常使用 从文件中读取使用 编写的数据。

span.span: Data written with is usually read from a file by using .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Write`提供和 `WriteLine` 函数是为了向后兼容，可能会影响性能。The `Write` and `WriteLine` functions are provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 对于非旧版应用程序， `My.Computer.FileSystem` 对象提供更好的性能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [使用 Visual Basic 进行文件访问](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access). 如果省略 `Output` ，则会在文件中打印一个空行。If you omit `Output`, a blank line is printed to the file. 多个表达式可以用逗号分隔。Multiple expressions can be separated with a comma. 与 `Print` 函数不同， `Write` 函数在写入到文件中时，在字符串中的项和引号之间插入逗号。Unlike the `Print` function, the `Write` function inserts commas between items and quotation marks around strings as they are written to the file. 不需要在列表中放置显式分隔符。You do not have to put explicit delimiters in the list. `Write`使用将数据写入文件时，仅支持数字、 `Boolean` 、日期、null 和 `Error` 数据格式。When `Write` is used to write data to a file, only numeric, `Boolean`, date, null, and `Error` data formats are supported. 遵循以下通用假设 `Input` ，这样无论区域设置如何，都可以使用读取和正确地解释数据：The following universal assumptions are followed so the data can always be read and correctly interpreted using `Input`, regardless of locale: - 始终使用句点作为小数点分隔符来编写数值数据。Numeric data is always written using the period as the decimal separator. - 对于 `Boolean` 数据，可以是 `#TRUE#` 或 `#FALSE#` 。For `Boolean` data, either `#TRUE#` or `#FALSE#` is printed. `True` `False` 不会转换和关键字，无论区域设置如何。The `True` and `False` keywords are not translated, regardless of locale. - 使用通用日期格式将数据写入文件。Date data is written to the file using the universal date format. 当日期或时间部分缺失或为零时，只将提供的部分写入文件中。When either the date or the time component is missing or zero, only the part provided is written to the file. - 如果数据为空，则不向文件写入任何内容 `Output` 。Nothing is written to the file if `Output` data is empty. 但对于空数据， `#NULL#` 将写入。However, for null data, `#NULL#` is written. - 对于 `Error` 数据，输出显示为 `#ERROR errorcode#` 。For `Error` data, the output appears as `#ERROR errorcode#`. `Error`不转换关键字，无论区域设置如何。The `Error` keyword is not translated, regardless of locale. `WriteLine``Chr(13) + Chr(10)`在将最后一个字符写入到文件中后，将换行符 (为、回车符/换行符或) `Output` 。`WriteLine` inserts a newline character (that is, a carriage return/line feed, or `Chr(13) + Chr(10)`), after it has written the final character in `Output` to the file. 您可以通过使用双引号或 "" 在字符串中嵌入引号。You can embed quotation marks in a string by using double quotation marks, or "". 例如，For example, [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#63](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#63)] 返回值为的字符串 `Double quotation marks aren't "difficult" to handle` 。returns a string with the value of `Double quotation marks aren't "difficult" to handle`. 使用 `Write` 或函数写入文件 `WriteLine` 需要 `Append` 枚举中的访问权限 `FileIOPermissionAccess` 。Writing to a file by using the `Write` or `WriteLine` functions requires `Append` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用 `Write` 函数将原始数据写入顺序文件。This example uses the `Write` function to write raw data to a sequential file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#64](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#64)]
